Thanks for the support!

story:
Story of My Book 

Neither Created Nor Destroyed is a memoir about overcoming trauma and hardship, the complexities of relationships, taking risks, exploration, and self actualization. Though we are evolutions of everything that has come before us, we are not always limited to or created by the beliefs, habits, and hormones that we inherit. Nor are we destroyed. 

My name is Nicki Avena and I am the author of Neither Created Nor Destroyed. I wrote this book because I process my experiences and emotions most easily through writing. I am also very drawn to reading memoir. Memoir is a magical portal from the secret and private to the universal. Reading the very personal stories that memoir typically presents, I tend to feel seen, relevant, understood, and therefore connected to something much larger than myself. I am inspired by stories of vulnerability and bravery, by those who go beyond their comfort zones. 

In my book I go beyond my comfort zones through physical actions, like traveling around the country and overseas alone, and managing crises. But also through emotional actions, like examining my habits and patterns, and ultimately taking accountability for my lived experiences. For those who may not feel comfortable expressing their emotions through spoken or written words, I feel like I can alleviate their feelings of being unseen, like my favorite authors have done for me.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the strength to reflect honestly on your own lived experiences. And that, by doing so, you’ll gain more empathy and grace for both yourself and those around you. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to be vulnerable alongside me as I sift through my own foibles, learning what I can and cannot control.
 

In this book, you'll encounter the nuanced ways in which trauma can affect brain chemistry, and how I lost control of my life, but got it back again through narratives like:

  • Visiting a therapist and learning what Trichotillomania is.
  • Driving one thousand miles across the Colorado desert, while grieving my sister’s death. 
  • Awakening from a nightmare about “the one who got away,” only to realize that I’ve been pining for connection to myself.


You will love this book if you are fiercely curious and are willing to call your own beliefs into question. If you are willing to look at the dark side of your own moon. If you enjoy absurd and trepidatious stories on nature, friendship, travel, and exploration. And if you intend to live your life bravely and with heart. 

Neither Created Nor Destroyed speaks to anyone who enjoys memoir, but especially millennials, due to time-period references. The memoir speaks to those who are invested in self discovery, and who want to interact with relationship to themselves and others in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Neither Created Nor Destroyed inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • Are we still viewing our personal histories through the eyes of our inner children? Or are we viewing them through the faculties of our developed, adult perspectives?
  • How can we contextualize our lived experiences in relation to the invisible socio-economic systems at play?
  • Can we develop more empathy for people in our communities, especially those that we judge, through accepting that every person inhabits every shade of the human and emotional spectrum? 

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing topics on grief, love, bravery, and empathy will change us all for the better. 

 

The Book - Neither Created Nor Destroyed

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the Author’s Note + chapters 1-7. In this section the reader will understand my sometimes harmful and sometimes blissful childhood. They’ll begin to form an understanding of my foundations and how I develop maladaptive coping mechanisms. Specifically, readers will witness this through stories like a fist fight with my sister that leaves me stranded on the side of a highway and pulling my hair out before a first date at the movies.

Part 2 contains chapters 8-14. In this section the reader will learn how maladaptive coping strategies express in my early twenties through alcohol and consecutive relationships. They will learn what it was like for me to truly lose control, as I straddle the line between my own victimhood and victimizing others. This is expressed, for example, through a story I tell about a reproductive dilemma and an unexpected endowment. 

Part 3 contains chapters 15-21. In this section the reader will learn some very valuable lessons with me, as I am fast tracked into adulthood through an avalanche of misfortunes. They will also learn how I was able to rescue myself through taking risks, assessing myself honestly, setting boundaries, and, most importantly, feeling everything. This is witnessed through the story of grieving my sister and a story about turning inward for the first time to examine qualities in my self that I have rejected in others.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring of 2021

 

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

  • I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the author

Nicki Avena is the Senior Graphic Designer at National Geographic. She’s also an accomplished road and trail runner, having completed her first marathon in January of 2020.Moonlighting as a fine artist, she nurtures personal projects, including writing and painting, inspired by the foibles of the human journey. Additionally, she finds theories of intuition, anthropology, and the curious habits of plant life titillating. She is fascinated by the natural world and feels most comfortable beneath the open sky.

Nicki wrote this book because, in the past, she’s felt remarkably moved when readers have expressed that her writing helped them work through something personal in their own life. Through her book, she wants to add her own, fuller, personal narrative to a great pool of meaning, much like her favorite memoir writers, who have helped contextualize the events of her own life. She is curious how many readers will relate to the very private experiences she vulnerably shares throughout her book. She deeply values relating to others, visual harmony, nesting, freedom, vitality, and mindfulness. She hopes that her book will help someone out there feel seen. 

Nicki is a clever dear with a heart that is as big as her hair. She doesn’t totally understand the concept of “time-zones,” wears a robe more often than not, and speaks frankly to birds when no one is looking. 

For more information, you can connect with Nicki at NickiAvena@gmail.com and at @Nicki.Avena.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #NeitherCreatedNorDestroyed and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.
  • Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

 

All of my gratitude,
Nicki

story:
Why Miscellany?

Unlike most other kinds of essays, the personal essay is voice-driven, making for extraordinarily compelling reading. Miscellany is full of voices, from the full-throated to the purposefully understated voice. The one thing they all have in common is they are young(ish) American voices narrating the experiences of those who people the fringes of society. 

The idea to put together a collection of personal essays has been a pet project at Run Amok Books for some time. Many a lunch hour has been spent in the Run Amok office (more like room) scouring the nonfiction sections of e-zines, looking for the right voices for this collection. It became readily apparent that although these essays were similar in the singularity of their voices, the subject matter one encountered while submersed in them ranged far and wide; thus, giving rise to our title Miscellany.

Where We Go From Here and How We Get There

Miscellany will be published September 1, 2018. We feel a great sense of pride and achievement in bringing this book to life. As a small press, we have designed/edited/formatted the book in-house; it is how we keep our costs down. Keeping costs down allows us to publish more worthy books, which is an integral part of the Run Amok mandate. Unfortunately, the budget for pet projects such as Miscellany is virtually non-existent. In order to pay our contributors we need to raise funds. And paying contributors will make publishing Miscellany, Volume 2 next year that much easier.

That's Where You Come In

By supporting our Miscellany campaign, you will be directly supporting the authors of this collection. To say that making money as an author is difficult is the granddaddy of all understatements. We want to do our part to change that, and you can help us. A small donation from you will not only help us to pay the authors but also help ensure that further volumes of Miscellany will see the light of day. For that you will have our undying gratitude. Of course, we will also provide perks as a way of saying thank you to our supporters, mainly books and coffee mugs and the like. Have a look and see what tickles your fancy.

The Numbers Crunch

The numbers are simple for this campaign. The first $550 dollars we raise will go directly to the authors. Eleven authors contributed to Miscellany, which means each will receive a payment of $50 each (certainly not an extravagant amount considering the hours that go into authoring an essay). Whatever is raised beyond $550 will be used for promotional purposes, specifically, to take out advertisements in the very e-zines where our authors were first discovered. Although online ads are generally more reasonable than print ads, they are still not cheap, running from $300-750, depending on the size and placement of the ad. We would like to raise at least $950 in this campaign, approximately 75% of the funding that we believe we need to pay the authors and do the advertising that we would like to do. Please consider supporting our Miscellany campaign, and help us to get this project off to a running--or at least trotting--start.

story:
Story of My Book

Cure Yourself Fearlessly is meant to change your perspective of the battle you are given, to trust yourself and know that you can heal through elements such as mindfulness, fearlessness, perception, mentality, vulnerability, spirituality, community, and prayer. I intertwined my cancer journey with the stories of other young adults who have been through different walks of life, such as dealing with cancer, chronic disease, limb loss, drug addiction, homelessness, and mental health illnesses, as well as the perspective of different life and spiritual coaches, pastors, psychologists, medical doctors, and so much more.

My name is Alexa Cucchiara and I am the author of Cure Yourself Fearlessly. I wrote this book because I want to change the conversation around owning your battle and using it as a way to positively change your trajectory on life and ultimately live fearlessly from your heart. We are all human and all go through storms, but what we need to do is learn to accept them and become encouraged to use other hope-filled stories to transform our own.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how to trust your intuition, and use your inner strength and God's power to influence your healing process. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for living through faith in you. And then, ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help inspire you to use the themes, inspiring quotes, and questions I ask you to ask yourself at the end of each chapter to transform your life in the way that they helped shift mine.

In this book, you'll learn about the power of acceptance, courage, faith, and community through raw and real stories from ordinary humans like me and you:
  • I used my memory of going to heaven to help me find peace and see the larger picture in my fight for life.
  • Jack Wallace used his community at Camp No Limits to inspire him to engage in the activities he loved, despite losing his leg in a boating accident during his childhood, which led him to become a gold-medalist Paralympian.
  • Grace Wethor used her death sentence and lived against the odds of her 8% survival rate by using her inner strength to pursue her dream of becoming a Vogue model and actress despite living with a brain tumor.

You will love this book if you feel hopeless, question the purpose of your life, and are looking for ways to become uplifted and inspired.

Cure Yourself Fearlessly is a non-fiction book that speaks to those facing a battle and/or living with trauma and are looking at a way to find hope and encouragement, and live in less fear.

 

The Book - Cure Yourself Fearlessly

The book is written with 7 themes:

Part 1 contains my introduction on the background of the events leading up to my cancer diagnosis and when and why I decided to write a book and use my vulnerability as a way to help heal others.

Part 2 contains Chapters 2-5. This educates the readers on the first steps they should take to help jump-start their healing journey such as acceptance, changing perception, fighting fears, and becoming vulnerable.

Part 3 contains Chapters 6-9. It encourages readers to use their intuition through meditation to help them dream big, follow what fuels their soul and sets them on fire.

Part 4 contains Chapters 10-11. This talks about how using faith in God/ the Universe can truly transform your life and gives tips on how non-believers can open their hearts to the beauty of integrating this different outlook in their day-to-day routines.

Part 5 contains Chapters 12-16. It talks about ways you can use your battle to help heal others. It inspires ways to build community and help thrive in your new community and keep them close to you in your next chapters in life.

Part 6 contains Chapters 17-19. It gives examples of using alternative ways such as the beauty of art and scripting in order to heal. The last chapter is an open space to help you write your new story.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2019
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter holiday season.
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.



I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author

Alexa Cucchiara is a New York City native. She is studying Business Administration and Marketing at Fordham University and is a member of Betta Gamma Sigma and The National Society of Leadership and Success. She is a commissioned artist and the founder and designer of the jewelry line One Twist Co.

Through Alexa's work, she aims to encourage others to use the power of vulnerability to create community. It is her goal to allow others to feel less alone.

Alexa is a health and wellness advocate, recipe developer, regular pilates participant, and entrepreneur enthusiast.

You can connect with Alexa at alexacucc@gmail.com and @alexacuc on Instagram.

Please visit alexacuc.com for more.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #CureYourselfFearlessly and tag me @alexacuc as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Alexa Cucchiara
story_txt:
Story of My Book
Cure Yourself Fearlessly is meant to change your perspective of the battle you are given, to trust yourself and know that you can heal through elements such as mindfulness, fearlessness, perception, mentality, vulnerability, spirituality, community, and prayer. I intertwined my cancer journey with the stories of other young adults who have been through different walks of life, such as dealing with cancer, chronic disease, limb loss, drug addiction, homelessness, and mental health illnesses, as well as the perspective of different life and spiritual coaches, pastors, psychologists, medical doctors, and so much more.My name is Alexa Cucchiara and I am the author of Cure Yourself Fearlessly. I wrote this book because I want to change the conversation around owning your battle and using it as a way to positively change your trajectory on life and ultimately live fearlessly from your heart. We are all human and all go through storms, but what we need to do is learn to accept them and become encouraged to use other hope-filled stories to transform our own.My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how to trust your intuition, and use your inner strength and God's power to influence your healing process. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for living through faith in you. And then, ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help inspire you to use the themes, inspiring quotes, and questions I ask you to ask yourself at the end of each chapter to transform your life in the way that they helped shift mine.In this book, you'll learn about the power of acceptance, courage, faith, and community through raw and real stories from ordinary humans like me and you:
I used my memory of going to heaven to help me find peace and see the larger picture in my fight for life.
Jack Wallace used his community at Camp No Limits to inspire him to engage in the activities he loved, despite losing his leg in a boating accident during his childhood, which led him to become a gold-medalist Paralympian.
Grace Wethor used her death sentence and lived against the odds of her 8% survival rate by using her inner strength to pursue her dream of becoming a Vogue model and actress despite living with a brain tumor.

You will love this book if you feel hopeless, question the purpose of your life, and are looking for ways to become uplifted and inspired.Cure Yourself Fearlessly is a non-fiction book that speaks to those facing a battle and/or living with trauma and are looking at a way to find hope and encouragement, and live in less fear.
 
The Book - Cure Yourself Fearlessly
The book is written with 7 themes:Part 1 contains my introduction on the background of the events leading up to my cancer diagnosis and when and why I decided to write a book and use my vulnerability as a way to help heal others.Part 2 contains Chapters 2-5. This educates the readers on the first steps they should take to help jump-start their healing journey such as acceptance, changing perception, fighting fears, and becoming vulnerable.Part 3 contains Chapters 6-9. It encourages readers to use their intuition through meditation to help them dream big, follow what fuels their soul and sets them on fire.Part 4 contains Chapters 10-11. This talks about how using faith in God/ the Universe can truly transform your life and gives tips on how non-believers can open their hearts to the beauty of integrating this different outlook in their day-to-day routines.Part 5 contains Chapters 12-16. It talks about ways you can use your battle to help heal others. It inspires ways to build community and help thrive in your new community and keep them close to you in your next chapters in life.Part 6 contains Chapters 17-19. It gives examples of using alternative ways such as the beauty of art and scripting in order to heal. The last chapter is an open space to help you write your new story. What I Need & What You'll Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following: 
The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2019
The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter holiday season.
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
And more...

story:
ABOUT ME / CHI SONO

My name is Daniele Errico, I am 49 years old and I am a photographer since 1997. I presently contribute to the magazines Bell’Italia and Inviaggio (published by Cairo) . I published a nature guide of Kenya with Carlderini-Agricole publisher, and also contributed to L’espresso and La Repubblica newspaper websites. I have been writing a blog called H24 on the Repubblica-Bari  website for 3 years now, and during the last year I created a new section called Sopravvissuti & Sopravviventi (Survivors & Survivings), in which every day I post a picture of a person followed by a famous quote.

Mi chiamo Daniele Errico ho 49 anni e sono un fotografo freelance dal 1997. Ho pubblicato una guida naturalistica del Kenya con Calderini-Edagricole.
Attualmente collaboro con le riviste Bell’Italia e InViaggio di Cairo editore. Sul web ho collaborato con L’Espresso e Repubblica. Sul sito di Repubblica-Bari da tre anni ho un blog che si chiama H24. Nell’ultimo anno è nata la sezione “Sopravvissuti & Sopravviventi” in cui ho postato ogni giorno una foto di una persona accompagnata da una frase celebre per un anno.

MOTIVATIONS

Creation of a photographic e-book, release of a book of photographs and a video of my journey of 3.400 km on a bike, on the pilgrimage routes of Europe. An ecological journey, on the discovery of the motivations of the pilgrims that for ages walked those roads to reach sacred and spiritual catholic places. A photographic tale during 60 days told by everything I am going to experience on my journey. A spiritual journey in which I can only count on myself, in a period in which the bustle and frenzy of everyday life do not leave us time for ourselves.

MOTIVAZIONI

Realizzazione di un e-book fotografico gratuito, di un libro fotografico  e di un video dei 3400 chilometri che percorrerò in bicicletta sulle strade del pellegrinaggio Europeo. Un viaggio ecologico alla scoperta delle motivazioni dei pellegrini che per secoli hanno camminato per raggiungere luoghi sacri, centri spirituali della cultura cattolica. 60 giorni raccontati fotograficamente da tutto quello che incontrerò sul mio cammino. Un viaggio anche interiore, durante il quale potrò contare solo sulle mie forze, in un momento storico in cui la frenesia e i tempi della vita non lasciano spazio per noi stessi.


SOCIAL COMMUNICATION CHANNELS:

The journey will be told on various media, starting with a minimalistic website with links to the project page on various social media Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, Instagram and on a blog on a national newspaper website.

Moreover an Android and Apple app will be available for free. The idea is to constantly keep the supporters  and backers up to date on the project.

CANALI SOCIAL MEDIA

L’esperienza del viaggio sarà raccontata attraverso diversi media: A partire dalle pagina del progetto nei social media come: Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, Instagram, e un blog su di una testata nazionale. Sarà costruito un sito molto minimale che rimanderà ai vari social media. Sarà inoltre disponibile un’applicazione scaricabile gratuitamente sia per device Apple che Android. L’idea è quella di aggiornare costantemente i fan del progetto.


PROJECT FEATURES

The project will last 2 months (July-August 2014), I will travel for 3.400 km by bike on the European  pilgrimage routes. The starting point will be Brindisi, the historical transit point for people traveling by sea to Jerusalem. The old Franchigena road to San Bernardo Pass would follow, passing through Monte Sant’Angelo, Benevento, Roma, Siena, Fidenza, finally reaching France with Lourdes and Saint Jean Pie de Port as destinations and from there continuing on the well-known french road leading to Santiago De Campostella and Finisterre.

The journey is divided in 4 sections:

Brindisi-Rome: 690 km in 10 days, 70 km per day.

Rome-Monginevro: 853 km in 11 days, 80 km per day.

Monginevro-Saint Jean Pied de Port: 959 km in 11 days, 87 km per day.

Saint Jean Pied de Port-Finisterre: 837 km in 14 days, 60 km  per day.

During the course of this journey I will find shelter in pilgrims guest houses or camp sites.


SPECIFICHE PROGETTO

Il progetto durerà 2 mesi (luglio - agosto 2014), percorrerò 3400 km in bicicletta, la maggior parte dei quali lungo le strade del pellegrinaggio europeo, partendo da Brindisi, punto di arrivo per chi si imbarcava per Gerusalemme, seguirò la vecchia via Francigena fino al Passo della Susa passando da Monte Sant’Angelo, Benevento, Roma, Siena, Fidenza. Attraverso la Francia per passare da Lourdes e arrivare a Saint Jean Pie De Port, per poi intraprendere la Classica via Francese per Compostela e quindi raggiungere Finisterre.

Dividerò il viaggio in 4 frazioni:

Brindisi - Roma : 690 Km percorsi in 10 giorni con una media di 70 km al giorno

Roma  - Monginevro: 853 Km percorsi in 11 giorni con una media di 80 km al giorno

Monginevro - Saint Jean Pie De Port: 959 Km percorsi in 11 giorni con una media di 87km al giorno

Saint Jean Pie De Port - Finisterre: 837 Km percorsi in 14 giorni con una media di 60km al giorno

Il pernottamento è previsto presso le strutture che ospitano i pellegrini, tenda, e ospitalità occasionale.


COSTS

Most of the costs of the project will be supported by donations or by providing equipment. A crowdfunding will be created to provide the photographic e-book, the photographic book and the video.

COSTI

Saranno in parte sostenuti da sponsor, tramite donazione attrezzatura.
Sarà attivato anche un crowdfounding per avere a fine progetto, il libro in formato cartaceo o elettronico e il video finale.


HOPE

A journey is a person in itself; no two are alike. And all plans, safeguards, policing, and coercion are fruitless. We find that after years of struggle that we do not take a trip; a trip takes us. John Steinbeck

SPERANZA

Un viaggio è una persona a sè; non ce ne sono due simili. E sono inutili progetti, garanzie, controlli, coercizioni. Scopriamo che dopo anni di lotta per non viaggiare; è il viaggio che ci prende.   John Steinbeck

story:
Who am I?

My name is E.M. Whittaker and I am the author of Turbulence.

I started writing when I was about 9 years old. At first I wrote fanfiction before getting into original fiction. Right now I live on the Eastern Shore in Maryland and I would be the woman that has every cat in her home if her roommates would let her :)

To see samples of my work, please visit http://ewhittaker.lonerenegade.net

You can also see the novel on Authonomy here: https://www.authonomy.com/book/61519/

**This is before the editors have touched it so this WILL be changed. 



Why am I asking for help?

In July, 2013, I started suffering from heart issues that drained the remaining savings I had towards publication. After several months out of work, getting testing done and two hospitalizations, I'm unable to complete funding for my novel, despite already sending it to an editor and cover artist. 

My second novel to the series is already being written but I still need help.


What do I need help with?

Here is a breakdown of costs in question.



Turbulence (book one)

Editorial $500

Cover Art $500

Typography, Layout, Interior Design $150

Promotion $500

Copyright Fee $60

ETA: December 2014.



Drift (book two)

Editorial $500

Cover Art $500

Copyright Fee $60

Typography, Layout, Interior Design $150

Promotion $500

ETA: July 2015

The other costs (about $600) go towards website fees, the character promo book and any changes in cost that may crop up (such as editors or cover artists changing their price, for example). 

These are all numbers that are accurate to pay the editors, cover artists and fees for registering these books as my own.



Where am I at in terms of publishing?

The cover artist has already been commissioned and you can see his works at this site:
http://www.lucidworkshops.net/works/

The editor also is a professional author who has been successful with Indiegogo campaigns before. Please also check out her other works that have been successful:
http://rjblain.com


What is it about?

This is the back cover synopsis:


“Only he can protect her.

Only she can catch the killer.

Both harbor a secret that could cost them everything.”

~~

In the heart of Baltimore City lies a city underground.

When the President declared war on paranormals and sports, they went underground to escape persecution. Some chanced it and stayed above, hiding as humans in government positions. Others disregarded those rules and lived as Renegades, those who are unlawful in the world.

Aviere Mye took a chance and secured a deal with the Crime Lord Syndicate as a street racer with her brothers as her teammates. But to cover her career costs, she still makes medicine and poisons for those willing to pay.

Suddenly, her clients are dying.

Every death is linked to the Crime Lord Syndicate and has attracted the attention of the FBI. When Keith Travis arrests her he gives her a choice—either help in the investigation or be killed.

Both have a secret that if leaked could cost them everything. But is it enough to keep them together and catch the killer before they lose their lives?


What is in it for you?

Along with getting to read the book, I'll be sending each donation a ebook copy complete with cuts and a interview about me. You'll also receive a save able image of cover art to use as a computer background photo.

the higher you donate, the better the reward.



Risks and Challenges

As a new author, there is the challenge that the book will not get enough exposure. I'm told that because this is somewhat of a different twist to the genre in question, which can put one at a disadvantage.

I want to be as honest as possible and tell you that those who have read it so far do like it and want this to succeed. 

Sometimes books just don't go the way they are planned. Other times it can a cult classic. Either way, I want to bring something to my readers that they not only enjoy but can pass on to their friends and family. 

The other challenge I have right now is the fact that I may have gastric surgery soon. If these do happen, I'll need to be able to still have the funds available to pay all these lovely people who make the magic happen (such as publishing the novel). 



Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some of you can't help with large amounts of money. Here are some other ways you can help.

Please use the share tools. They'll help just a bit :)

Share this on social media platforms such as Google +, Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest.

LinkedIn is very good for this sort of thing too, since this is a business endeavor.

Tell your friends and family. The more people that know, the better this will succeed.

Others disregarded those rules and lived as Renegades, those who are unlawful in the world.Aviere Mye took a chance and secured a deal with the Crime Lord Syndicate as a street racer with her brothers as her teammates. But to cover her career costs, she still makes medicine and poisons for those willing to pay.Suddenly, her clients are dying.Every death is linked to the Crime Lord Syndicate and has attracted the attention of the FBI. When Keith Travis arrests her he gives her a choice—either help in the investigation or be killed.Both have a secret that if leaked could cost them everything. But is it enough to keep them together and catch the killer before they lose their lives?What is in it for you?Along with getting to read the book, I'll be sending each donation a ebook copy complete with cuts and a interview about me. You'll also receive a save able image of cover art to use as a computer background photo.the higher you donate, the better the reward.Risks and ChallengesAs a new author, there is the challenge that the book will not get enough exposure. I'm told that because this is somewhat of a different twist to the genre in question, which can put one at a disadvantage.I want to be as honest as possible and tell you that those who have read it so far do like it and want this to succeed. Sometimes books just don't go the way they are planned. Other times it can a cult classic. Either way, I want to bring something to my readers that they not only enjoy but can pass on to their friends and family. The other challenge I have right now is the fact that I may have gastric surgery soon. If these do happen, I'll need to be able to still have the funds available to pay all these lovely people who make the magic happen (such as publishing the novel). Other Ways You Can HelpI understand that some of you can't help with large amounts of money. Here are some other ways you can help.Please use the share tools. They'll help just a bit :)Share this on social media platforms such as Google +, Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest.LinkedIn is very good for this sort of thing too, since this is a business endeavor.Tell your friends and family. The more people that know, the better this will succeed.

story:
COSMIC SPACE - REALM OF EVIL

A NOVEL BY B. RILEY


My Work

My name is Bill Riley. As a young boy growing up in a small Texas town, I became fascinated with science fiction novels and movies. While attending a Christian university, I realized the breath of my skill as a writer. However, it was only a few years ago that I began my first novel. I felt that it was a good time to develop a new science fiction collection of works. While Star Trek and Star Wars are timeless collections, the audience has seen decades of writings and movies from their creation. Now, a fresh, new science fiction universe has been developed in my completed novel, Cosmic Space-Realm of Evil. I am passionate about my new novel from which future novels, games and media entertainment will be launched. For five years, I have reasoned, studied and fashioned an original story that is a deep expression of my inner person. Rooted in my understanding of the concepts that audiences cherished most in Star Trek and Star Wars, I have crafted my novel to merge those same concepts in an epic tale. My goal is to promote, publish and develop my work for the entertainment of general audiences around the world.  Your contribution will help bring this goal to reality. Your support will be a driving force that launches a new wave of science fiction thrills, enlightenment and enrichment for the viewing public. In this, you will be rewarded. The rewards that I discuss herein will give each contributor a piece of this new universe.


The Goal

I am seeking $250,000.00 through my campaign. This is the amount that I estimate that will be needed to complete this project. These funds will allow for the publishing of my completed novel. In my research, I have found that it is very difficult to have a publisher work with a first-time author. The main reason is that book publishers get thousands of book submissions every day. A new author has to work to make his novel stand out from the crowd, and I can accomplish this by doing the following:


  1. Increasing my level of graphics in promotional videos, print, book cover and book illustrations.

  2. Creating an interactive website that includes a mid-level game tied to my novel, along with exclusive content pertaining to the storyline of my novel.

  3. Create an electronic version of my novel to sell online with Amazon, Barnes and Noble and other e-Book retailers

  4. Fund marketing efforts to drive traffic to my website, e-Book and general sales of my novel.

  5. Commence work on my sequel novel, Cosmic Space-Annihilation.


This is a very exciting time, and it will be a great ride for all of you who help fund this adventure. As I mentioned above, those who contribute to my project will be rewarded if my campaign is successful and my novel, Cosmic Space-Realm of Evil can be published.

Thank You

As a special treat and as a thank you for viewing my campaign, I am including an exclusive first look at my novel. Please click on my Gallery for the opening ten pages of my copyrighted novel, Cosmic Space-Realm of Evil. Additionally, I am including exclusive artwork from certain chapter scenes of Cosmic Space-Realm of Evil. I hope you enjoy viewing my work and I appreciate your support. Thank you for visiting my campaign.

story:
"I simply cannot imagine the Toronto Lit scene without Kirby and knife | fork | book." Jim Johnstone, Poet. Publisher, Anstruther Press

"knife | fork | book really is what inspires me the most. You are the light and colour and hub of it all in Toronto." S. TAKATSU, Poet. Publisher, Inspiritus Press

"Thanks for giving poetry a home." Jimmy McInnes, Poet.

"The best 9 square feet in the city." Jacob McArthur-Mooney, Poet.

"My new favourite person and place in the world." Ulrikka S. Gernes, Poet.

"Toronto is one lucky bitch." Damian Rogers, Poet.

2017 Best New Bookstores - Toronto Life Magazine

Your contributions will not only help to finance our necessary move, but continue KFB's free stellar #ThursdayNightPoets Series, KFB's new chapbook imprint, and the one and only poetry-only bookshop in Canada.

story:
This campaign is still active.  And we continue to welcome new "backers"!! 

  • BUT,... PLEASE BE ADVISED THAT NONE OF THE PERKS OFFERED DURING THE FIRST PHASE OF THIS CAMPAIGN ARE NOW AVAILABLE. 

However, we appreciate every contribution, no matter how small, and for a donation of fifty dollars or more you will receive a copy of CLANDESTINE: The Times and Secret Life of Mariah Otey Reddick when published. 

For those of you who wish to purchase one or more of the CLANDESTINE perks, you can do so at the CafePress website: https://www.cafepress.com/cp/customize/saved_products.aspx?fpg=%201&ufpg=%202. We DO NOT receive any income from purchases at CafePress.

THANKS TO ALL "BACKERS" FOR YOUR SUPPORT!! NO amount is too small!

WE THANK EACH OF YOU who has graciously given your support and/or donation to help bring YOUR and our project closer to fruition.  Thanks to you, we reached and surpassed our "goal!"   However, we are still accepting contributions because our pre- and post-publication expenses far exceed the funds raised.  So YOU can still be a part of this project and the journey of Linking Generations.

 ANY AND ALL DONATIONS - OF ANY AMOUNT - AND SUPPORT ARE MOST WELCOME.  THANKS SO MUCH!!

*******************************

CLANDESTINE – LINKING GENERATIONS: A story for all generations.  Help us encourage your child, grandchild, another child or young adult to learn more about their history.  If you are the young adult, do likewise for your parents, cousins, aunts, uncles, classmates, etc.

The writing of CLANDESTINE became a mission for Ife and Damani because it tells the story of a People’s resilience and the struggle to retain their dignity and their African customs and family connections, as well as a story of unconditional love, passion, and commitment - a story they felt obligated to share. 

Damani and Ife lift up and honor the ancestors' implacable resistance despite a century’s long effort to obliterate those cultural essentials.

So,..

...you discovered that YOUR enslaved Ancestor was a human wedding gift?  After the lump in your throat, the sadness in your soul and the anger in your heart subside, would YOU forget about it?  We could not!

GREETINGS FAMILY, FRIENDS, SUPPORTERS AND BOOK LOVERS,

WE INTRODUCE YOU TO:

CLANDESTINE: THE TIMES AND SECRET LIFE OF MARIAH OTEY REDDICK, a book inspired by the life of William “Damani” Keene's great-grandmother Mariah. He and Carole “Ife” Keene, as Contributing Author, decided on historical fiction as the best genre to tell their story.  CLANDESTINE is the book that each one of us would be compelled to write to ensure the preservation of the history and legacy of our Ancestors. We seek your help to tell our story, YOUR story, the untold story of a People marginalized in history.

                

                           Ife & Damani - Freshman Year at HU (1962)

Damani’s research has confirmed some truly fascinating oral family lore - but not all.  He verified that Mariah worked in the Montgomery, Alabama household of Confederate President Jefferson Davis. 

Family lore has it that she was a spy for the Union!

CLANDESTINE is the story of YOUR and OUR Ancestors!!  We felt our Ancestors pushing us at critical junctures in the writing.  Not only was this a husband-wife collaboration, but it has also been a Village project!!!  So many people have assisted us with research, with documents, with encouragement, and above all, with love.  #ClandestineBook

An impetus for writing CLANDESTINE is to promote LINKING GENERATIONS - the older with the younger.  It is important that we as a people, both young and old, learn as much as we can about our own ancestry to gain and internalize as much knowledge as we can about the arduous journey of African/Black people and others of good will.  We then must commit to passing this information on from one generation to the next.  It is essential that we push our youth to do likewise by stressing the significance of them becoming positively engaged in our communities. What a difference that will make!  Our youth must be an integral part of preserving the rich history of African/Black people.  In this context and in CLANDESTINE, people of African descent are referenced as African, regardless of their place of birth or nationality.

HOW MANY GENERATIONS OF FAMILY CAN YOU LINK?
WE CAN LINK SEVEN!  THIS IS IFE'S SIDE...

          

   1st  Generation                    2nd Generation          3rd Generation

4th Generation. Carole "Ife" Kilgore Keene is a retired Information Systems professional. She is a twice-published author who now spends her time enjoying life in the Republic of Panama with her wonderful husband William “Damani” Keene. Ife is Contributing Author of the historical novel: CLANDESTINE: The Times and Secret Life of Mariah Otey Reddick, which Damani began writing several years ago. They expect to publish in the September timeframe

5th Generation. Khalid Valentine Keene is William “Damani” and Ife Keene’s oldest child. Khalid’s two awesome siblings are Dr. Kweli Keene Carson, wife of Dr. Reginald Carson, and Malik Imari Keene. Khalid is a well-established songwriter, producer, recording artist, drummer, performer, two-time Grammy nominee, columnist and General Manager extraordinaire.

6th Generation. Grandson Khalid Valentine Keene, II, also known as K, is the son of Mignon Green and Khalid Keene. Both K and granddaughter Nandi A. Carson (now a Spelman College sophomore) maintained a straight-A average during this past school year. K is now a high school senior. An abundance of shout-outs and kudos to them!

6th Generation. Granddaughter Brittany Jackson is the daughter of LaTisha Skinner and Khalid Keene. Brit has an amazingly wonderful story to tell of her search for and VERY recent union with her father, Ife and Damani’s son Khalid.  The families’ hearts are filled with much joy and happiness. What a blessing! Also, congrats to Brit on her recent promotion at the Navy Federal Credit Union and her upcoming wedding to Anthony Mills in August.

7th Generation. Great-grandson Jachai Jackson-Hughes is the son of Brittany Jackson and Carlton Hughes.  He is quite an athlete and is destined for greatness both academically and athletically.

Together as a village, we can have a huge impact on preserving our heritage.  We can do this powerfully by sharing with many others the resistance, resilience, beauty, glory, and splendor of African people and by participating in LINKING GENERATIONS.  We believe this is an influential and positive way to have a monumental effect on future generations.  Give a youngster a copy of CLANDESTINE and then dialogue with him or her.  

Again, We Humbly Ask For YOUR Support - NO DONATION IS TOO SMALL! 

We humbly ask for your support and cannot express our appreciation and gratitude enough!  Without you and your kind and generous donation and support, our project would be delayed.  Your willing participation in this effort validates our sense of urgency to tell Mariah’s story.  This is one of the many reasons we say that  CLANDESTINE is OUR story and YOUR story, too.

CLANDESTINE uniquely includes a wealth of true, but lesser known historical facts about the trials and tribulations, and strength and resilience of African/Black people.  We are committed to telling an honest, uplifting and inspiring story about how African/Black people have overcome and survived the challenges and injustices that we have faced and continue to face. 

We are confident you will willingly endorse this project if you are:  

  • a lover of people;
  • enthusiastic about future generations acquiring accurate knowledge about the  history of African/Black people;
  • a history buff;
  • a reader of historical fiction;
  • all about family and friends; or
  • all of the above.

We have expended substantial funds to get the project to this point.  However, there are additional expenditures, which require supplemental funds to complete the project.  They include funds:

  • to pay an editor – as a supplement to our monies;
  • for enhancements to website functionality; and
  • for the book jacket art and design.

We thank you in advance for your endorsement and support.  ANY AND ALL DONATIONS AND SUPPORT ARE WELCOME AND APPRECIATED - NO MATTER HOW LARGE OR SMALL!

Just So You Know...

Our personal expenditures to date include:

  • four trips to Franklin, Tennessee to conduct research and get a feel for the ambiance that existed during Mariah’s life at Carnation Plantation versus how the city exists today;
  • payment to two potential editors - one to review and edit the book’s Prologue and the other to conduct a detailed assessment of the entire manuscript;
  • payment to a crowdfunding expert to learn how to launch a successful campaign;
  • payment for marketing  and other software;
  • payment for the design and printing of promotional items for marketing CLANDESTINE; and
  • initial payment for development of the CLANDESTINE-Life.com website.

Contemplating her resilience and courage, Damani stands in The Quarters at Carnton Plantation, where his great-grandmother Mariah may have lived while she was held in bondage.

HOW TO DONATE 

You can receive your perk and make an online payment using your credit or debit card here at IndieGoGo.  American Express is not accepted by IndieGoGo.

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU

In appreciation of your generous support and donations, we guarantee you a fascinating, honest, fact-based, intriguing, and yes, love story, primarily through the eyes of enslaved and free Africans/Blacks on three continents and the Caribbean. 

Additionally, as a SMALL token of our eternal thanks for your donation, we will send you a perk associated with your donation.  Click the "Get This Perk" button at the right of your computer screen to make your donation and to receive the perk associated with it.

The actual color, size, and image of the perk may be somewhat different from what is shown.  Due to extremely high overseas shipping costs, perks will be shipped to US addresses only.  Remember if you don’t provide a name and shipping address at the time of donation, we cannot ship your perk.  

For anyone who donates $350 and above, as an unwavering expression of our thanks, we offer an additional unique and exciting perk:

A complimentary 30-minute phone consultation with Gen2Gen Media, a company which creates videos that capture and preserve your family's history. 

In Gen2Gen Media's own words:  "Passing down verbal, family stories from generation to generation defines who we are.  Gen2Gen Media helps families by creating video memoirs that can preserve the story of a family, in their own words. The Gen2Gen Media team is experienced in the art of storytelling by providing intimate interviews and detailed editing to produce a quality documentary.  We believe that all family stories should be documented and recorded so let us create a unique personal memoir on video for your family today."

Gen2Gen Media:  Passing down stories that strengthen and celebrate your family.  Please visit them at www.gen2genmedia.com.

Donors outside the US will be acknowledged via our Facebook posts, Tweets and recognition on our CLANDESTINE-Life Blog.  And if requested, an electronic version of the CLANDESTINE mini poster will be emailed to you. 

Also, our plan is to release CLANDESTINE as a printed book and/or an ebook.  For those whose perk includes more than one ebook, please email us directly with the email address(es) for the person(s) whom you want to receive an ebook.

NOTE:  PLEASE SEE "UPDATES" FOR SPECIAL PROMOTIONS,
BONUSES, DONOR RECOGNITION AND NOTIFICATIONS. 

JUST CLICK ON "UPDATES" SHOWN AT THE
BEGINNING OF THIS STORY SECTION.  THANKS!!

OUR TRACK RECORD

Although we have contributed to crowdfunding campaigns in the past, we have never launched one ourselves.  We do, however, have a successful track record of sponsoring trips to Panama for almost a decade.  The largest group was an International Women's Retreat in 2004, with more than 100 Special Guests, including 80 who traveled from the USA.  Other groups attended the Panama Jazz Festival and/or vacationed at beach resorts and visited educational sites and, of course, the amazing Panama Canal – a wonder of the world.  We always received rave reviews from our Special Guests and had several requests to sponsor future trips, which we did.  And Ife has authored and published two books.

ABOUT THE AUTHORS

Following is much more than you probably would EVER want to know about us.  However, IndieGoGo suggests that you get to know us. :-)

Bill “Damani” Keene, educator, researcher and new Author, is a native New Yorker.  His early years were spent in Harlem, living in a small studio apartment in a five-story walk-up tenement building around the corner from his dad’s jewelry shop on 7th Avenue.  When he was eight, his family moved to St. Albans in Queens.  After P.S. 118 and J.H.S. 59, he graduated from Andrew Jackson High School, and in the Fall of 1962, was off to Howard University (HU), at the strong suggestion of his parents.  He was active in numerous campus activities and service projects and was chapter President of his fraternity, Alpha Phi Omega, the National Service Fraternity.

Upon graduating from Howard, Damani entered the US Air Force as an officer in 1966.  He facilitated a Black History class at McNeil Island Federal Penitentiary.  He was honorably discharged, despite his outspoken opposition to the Vietnam War, as a Captain in 1970.  He then worked as a community organizer in Brooklyn, NY, and entered graduate school at Cornell University to prepare for a career in student services in higher education.  He led protests demanding that Cornell divest its investments in Southern Africa and led a memorial for the men slaughtered by the State of New York at Attica State Prison.

Damani considered himself very fortunate to return to Howard in 1972 as Associate Director of Student Activities.  By this time, all three of his and Ife’s children had been born and he was enjoying fatherhood.  After returning to the DC area in ‘72, Damani and Ife had continued their activism on behalf of African liberation struggles and were honored to work closely with Kwame Ture (Stokely Carmichael) for many years.  In recognition of the importance of Africentric

                                    

                 Ife & Damani at Africana Center     Ife Greeting Hero Kwame Ture                                      Cornell University - 1971              Howard University - 1998

education, he and Ife volunteered in support of Ujamaa Shule and Watoto Shule, both in DC.  During his 32 years at Howard, he served in several positions, including 10 years as Executive Assistant to the Vice President for Student Affairs and for 14 years was in charge of student housing as Dean for Residence Life. He had shorter stints in International Student Services, Blackburn Center (Acting Director at its opening in 1979) and Acting Associate Director Athletics.  At the time of his retirement in 2004, he was the Special Assistant to the Vice Provost for Student Affairs.  Damani enjoyed all of the jobs he had while at Howard and his daily interaction with the students was quite fulfilling.

Following a 2003 trip to South Africa, Damani and Ife decided to depart the US.  They conducted their research, looked at their options and chose Panamá as the best location.  They purchased a home in the mountains, sold their home in Maryland and, in October 2004, moved to Sunset Dreams, to enjoy their little slice of paradise in the mountains of Panamá.  This allowed Damani the time to begin his Family Heritage research in earnest.

Damani continues to explore his interests in history and politics and shares his perspectives with others online (probably, too much!).

Ife and Damani are the proud parents of three wonderful children, Khalid V. Keene, Dr. Kweli K. Carson, and Malik I. Keene. They are also the loving parents-in-law of Dr. Reggie Carson and the delighted and proud grandparents of Nandi Anika Carson, Khalid Valentine Keene, II, Brittany Jackson, and great grandparents of Jachai Jackson.

Carole “Ife” Keene was born in Knoxville, Tennessee, obtained her formative education in Brevard, North Carolina, where she attended kindergarten and 1st grade, and then in Camden, New Jersey, where she graduated from Woodrow Wilson High School before attending and graduating from Howard University.  On her second day at Howard, she met William “Damani” Keene.  Together, they enjoyed many memorable times during their four-year courtship at Howard. 

Ife's most fulfilling pursuit at Howard was becoming a member of Gamma Sigma Sigma National Service Sorority, the Sister sorority to Alpha Phi Omega.  She especially enjoyed working on projects that focused on interacting with the youth in Howard's surrounding communities.  In addition to participating in several other campus activities, Ife was Dean of Pledgees during one semester. 

Damani and Ife were married at the end of their senior year.  Enjoying 52 years of a happy marriage, their motto is "Never stop  honeymooning!"

           Upon receiving a Bachelors of Arts degree in Sociology from Howard, Ife decided to make a drastic career change to the information systems field – a profession dominated by men in the seventies.  She attended a ten-month computer programming training program, where she graduated #2 in her class.  As a result, she was offered a position as a Computer Programmer with the Space Division of General Electric (GE), where she worked for almost two years.  After leaving GE, Ife’s achievements were recognized by repeated promotions to progressively responsible positions during her 20+ years in the information systems arena, including Director of Business Development and Senior Vice President.  Her ultimate accomplishment in the information technology arena was to become a co-owner of a woman-owned and operated management consulting firm, Quality Solutions, Inc. (QSI). 

One of Ife’s most rewarding undertakings was to spearhead a successful one-of-its-kind international women’s retreat in the Republic of Panama in November of 2006.  The concept of Soothe Our Souls (SOS) and the retreat were an outgrowth of a book she wrote and published, Cancer of the Spirit, another of her notable accomplishments.  Over 100 attendees, predominately African-American women, some accompanied by their sweethearts (husbands and boyfriends), from many parts of the U.S., enjoyed a week-long substance- and spiritually-packed agenda, including dynamic speakers, workshops, book signings, excursions, tours, exhibits, massages and facials, salsa dance lessons, and unforgettable entertainment from Panamanian and U.S. entertainers. 

For many years, Ife also graced the motivational speaking scene and conducted workshops that focused on self-improvement, an underlying theme of Cancer of the Spirit.

Visit http://www.sootheoursouls.com/sosretreat.html for a summary of retreat activities and testimonials, and http://www.sootheoursouls.com/gallery/ for photos.  Also visit http://www.smashwords.com/books/view/146049 for review and purchase of Ife’s second book, an e-book, All Of A Sudden It’s Too Late,

#ClandestineBook

MANY THANKS!!!  DAALU!!!  GRACIAS!!! ASANTE SANA!!!

Again, we thank each of you in advance for your confidence in our project and for your donations and support.  Also, and more importantly, thank you so very much for all that you have already personally done to recognize, elevate, honor and promote the dignity and triumphs of African/Black people.  We cannot stress enough how much we would also appreciate your endorsement of our promotion of LINKING GENERATIONS. 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN SUPPORT THIS PROJECT

1.  Mailing List

Sign up for our mailing list at http://clandestine-life.com/contact-us/so that we can tell you about our special program to "Honor Thy Ancestor."

2.  Sharing on Social Media

Whether or not you give a monetary donation, we ask that you PLEASE SHARE the LINK to this INDIEGOGO campaign with all of your family and personal friends by:

  • Email 
  • Twitter - (Follow us: @DamaniKeene)
  • Facebook - (SHARING our posts at: www.facebook.com/carole.i.keene and www.facebook.com/DamaniKeene) 
  • Use #ClandestineBook

A resonating voice creates interest and excitement.  So, please let yours be heard.

3.  Word of Mouth

Word of mouth is the most personalized and powerful vehicle for getting the word out, no matter what the subject matter.  This intimate form of communication will do the job, so PLEASE SHARE your excitement about CLANDESTINE.

4.  Opportunity for an Interview – Radio, TV, Podcast or Print

These media attract an audience of dedicated followers who have made listening, reading and/or watching a part of their daily/weekly routine. PLEASE SHARE information about CLANDESTINE with those hosts, writers or producers you know AND share their contact information with us.

We gratefully and humbly express our sincere and heartfelt thanks!!
