story:
Story of my Book

Youth Organizer is a book about how young people can build more powerful digital-first communities.

My name is Ashley Lin and I am the author of Youth Organizer. I wrote this book because after the pandemic started and schools went online, I felt incredibly disconnected from the clubs and communities I belonged to at school — and I know many of my peers felt the same way. Without the hallway conversations, lunch meetings, and other in-person connections of convenience, it was really hard to stay connected with people and accomplish everything that we had wanted to do. I wanted to help young people adapt our communities online and continue creating impact together.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how to build powerful online communities. You’ll discover that not only is it possible for thriving digital communities to be created online, there are common building blocks to these communities and a battle-tested process that the best community builders follow. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for cultivating communities and building spaces of belonging and power online. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you build digital communities where you feel like you belong, are cared for, and gain increased agency over the future of your own life and the world around you.

In this book, you'll learn about how community building has evolved, the building blocks and processes for building thriving online communities, and how you can apply these principles to create your own. You'll hear stories such as...

  • How Civics Unplugged has cultivated a youth-led, digital-first community of Gen Z “civic superheroes” leading a 10-year campaign called Civics 2030 to build democracy around the world
  • How Project Exchange’s Digital Exchange Program went from a Slack channel with hundreds of students and absolute silence, to a real community where students feel excited and empowered to organize their own events
  • How #BuiltByGirls scaled and sustains a community that prepares thousands of young women and non-binary students to step boldly into careers powered by technology

 

You will love this book if you want to make your school club, student organization, youth-led non-profit, or simply your friend group more community-like.

Youth Organizer is a nonfiction book that speaks to community-spirited young leaders and adult supporters who want to cultivate thriving digital communities that builds belonging and power online.

 

The Book - Youth Organizer

The book is written in 3 parts...

Part 1 How We Got Here: Introduction + chapters 1-3
We’ll start by diving into what exactly a community is, the history and evolution of online communities, and why online communities are now more important than ever. We follow the journey of how youth-led nonprofits such as Girl Genius rejected transactional team dynamics and built real community that empowers their team members, and explore how youth activists have leveraged digital communities to power movements such as March for our Lives and #FridaysForFuture.

Part 2 Building Blocks of Digital Communities: Chapters 4-12
Here we use organizations like Civics Unplugged, Project Exchange, and #BuiltByGirls as case studies to dig deeper and map the building blocks and community-building processes they share. Each chapter is guided by a key question such as “What are the qualities of a good community builder?” and “What technologies can help with building digital communities?” or provocations like “leading with love” and “decentralizing power.” These chapters cover everything from establishing a why and finding your people to curating aesthetics and vibe.

Part 3 Cultivating Your Community: Chapters 13-15
In the final section we’ll explore how you can apply the building blocks and processes shared in Part 2 to change culture and make your existing groups more community-like, start communities of your own, and power social change. We look at how leaders of the communities spotlighted above actually started their community building journeys, what you can do today to become a better community builder, and the gentle experiments you can introduce to help your group become a community and realize its full potential.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats)
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer

 

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. 

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • A personally signed copy of my book when I publish,
  • A personal, handwritten thank-you note for pre-ordering my book,
  • Your name will appear in a special Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”),
  • Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback,
  • The opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title,
  • An invitation to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process,
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Ashley Lin is a social entrepreneur and community builder on a mission to reimagine the future of education. Ashley is the founder of Project Exchange, a youth-led 501c3 nonprofit democratizing access to study abroad through virtual exchange programs and the co-founder of the Mindful Applicant, an edtech startup leveraging the college application process for social emotional learning. Ashley has been recognized as a National Geographic Young Explorer, Coca-Cola Scholar, and previous U.S. Youth Ambassador to Uruguay. She will be joining the Jerome Fisher Management & Technology program at the University of Pennsylvania in Fall 2021.

Ashley wrote this book because she deeply believes that making community-building knowledge accessible is the best way to give real power to young people to learn, grow, and catalyze change. She’s grateful to be part of many incredible youth-led, digital-first communities that have created spaces where she feels a persistent sense of belonging, love, and collective agency — and Ashley wants to help other young people discover and build communities of their own.

When she’s not writing or fiddling with random items on Zoom calls, Ashley can be found reading, kickboxing, going on long walks in nature, and playing the piano (poorly but passionately). She also loves hanging out with good friends in the Cool Cats Club, organizing “sleepovers” with her two younger sisters, and watching Chinese dramas with family!

For more information you can connect with Ashley on LinkedIn, at ashley@myprojectexchange.com, or at @ashleylin_writing on Instagram.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #YouthOrganizer #community and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

 

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support! This is really my dream come true and I’m crossing my fingers I get to share it with all of you.

Thanks again,
Ashley Lin

story:
¿Qué?

Perros en el tintero es una novela escrita por y para perros… si los perros supieran leer y escribir.

Noemí es una persona curiosa que destaca por sus ideas políticamente incorrectas. Entre ellas la de adoptar a Joana sin una intención convencional. Joana trata de averiguar por qué ha sido adoptada pero la curiosa profesión de Noemí es tan absorbente que incluso la atañe a ella: es guardería canina en su propio domicilio y tener una media de diez perros en casa de día y de noche le resultará un verdadero quebradero de cabeza que Noemí ve como la razón de su vida.
          Joana no tiene ni idea de perros, pero se verá forzada a aprender y decidir si esa es la vida que quiere tener porque tener un perro es normal.
          Tener dos demuestra que te gustan.
          Tres es el límite de la locura.
          Pero el ingente número que controla Noemí es un arca complicada de llevar si no sabes cómo hacerlo… Y aunque sepas cómo, a veces también necesitas un poco de instinto que te guíe entre los pelos del sofá y las patas embarradas dispersadas por la moqueta de un día lluvioso.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Tania Canento.

Nacida en Pamplona, seguramente la encuentres allí o en medio del monte con sus perros. Tras pasar la ESO sin pena ni gloria vio en la FP de autoedición que podía hacerlo mejor y empezó bachiller artístico sin saber muy bien qué estaba haciendo pero lo aprobó y con esa base metió el hocico en todo lo que tuviera que ver con perros; desde peluquería canina hasta psicopatología clínica canina. Podría sentar perros en un diván pero era más divertido seguir con cursos de auxiliar veterinaria y adiestramiento canino. Al fin y al cabo, ser psicólogo canino es ser psicólogo humano y ya hay demasiados humanos en esta vida.

Siempre ha luchado por vivir de lo que le gusta y tras hacer realidad hacer exposiciones de sus dibujos y trabajar con animales ya le tocaba publicar libros. Por eso tienes la oportunidad de leer su segunda novela, Perros en el tintero, que no es otra cosa que experiencia hilarante de la convivencia con estos simpáticos y desconcertantes animales.

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«―¿Qué quieres de postre?
          ―No hay nada.
          ―Hay galletas. Y… turrón. Sigo sin saber por qué aún me queda turrón.
          ―Quiero hablar contigo.
          ―Era del blando pero ya estará duro y… ¿Qué?
          ―Que tengo que hablar contigo ―soltó Joana sorprendiéndose a sí misma.
          ―Una cosa antes… ¿Te has desecho de eso? Mañana vienen los dueños de Mario y no quiero meterme en berenjenales.
         Joana estuvo a punto de gruñir entre dientes y recordando la cadena del baño rezongó:
          ―Sí. Ya no está.
          ―Guay. Dime entonces.
          ―Para adoptarme necesitas tener una pareja…
          Noemí asintió como si nada y apoyó la barbilla sobre sus nudillos que sujetaban verticalmente el tenedor:
          ―Ah, sí. Algo de eso he leído en el contrato.
          ―¿Y dónde está?
          Noemí miró el reloj:
          ―Seguramente esté trabajando pero no te preocupes por él. No vive aquí ―Joana dejó de entender la conversación―. ¿Algo más?
          ―¿Cómo que no vive aquí?
          Noemí le dio vuelta al tenedor y se rascó la cabeza con él:
          ―Para explicar es un poco enrevesado… Lo simplificaré. Esa parte del contrato de adopción está ligeramente amañada.
          ―¿Qué?
          ―No te exasperes. Solo un poco ―dijo sonriendo―. Era necesario para adoptarte.
          ―¿Y por qué me has adoptado?
          ―¿Qué por qué qué?
          ―Que por qué me adoptaste.
          Noemí se encogió de hombros:
          ―Porque tú querías venir conmigo.
          ―Pero por qué un adolescente. Los niños son mejores. Todo el mundo quiere niños.
          ―¿En serio? ¿Con la de trabajo que dan? ―dijo Noemí como pensando en voz alta. Sacudió la cabeza y volvió a encogerse de hombros―: ¿De verdad importa el porqué? Si crees que te voy a obligar a vivir la vida de cualquier forma que a mí me convenga ni te preocupes. La vida es algo personal. Deberías vivirla como tú prefieras».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona a la autora, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Tania Canento vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Política de Privacidad
story_txt:
¿Qué?
Perros en el tintero es una novela escrita por y para perros… si los perros supieran leer y escribir.
Noemí es una persona curiosa que destaca por sus ideas políticamente incorrectas. Entre ellas la de adoptar a Joana sin una intención convencional. Joana trata de averiguar por qué ha sido adoptada pero la curiosa profesión de Noemí es tan absorbente que incluso la atañe a ella: es guardería canina en su propio domicilio y tener una media de diez perros en casa de día y de noche le resultará un verdadero quebradero de cabeza que Noemí ve como la razón de su vida.          Joana no tiene ni idea de perros, pero se verá forzada a aprender y decidir si esa es la vida que quiere tener porque tener un perro es normal.          Tener dos demuestra que te gustan.          Tres es el límite de la locura.          Pero el ingente número que controla Noemí es un arca complicada de llevar si no sabes cómo hacerlo… Y aunque sepas cómo, a veces también necesitas un poco de instinto que te guíe entre los pelos del sofá y las patas embarradas dispersadas por la moqueta de un día lluvioso.
¿Quiénes?
Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.
De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.
Hoy te presentamos a Tania Canento.
Nacida en Pamplona, seguramente la encuentres allí o en medio del monte con sus perros. Tras pasar la ESO sin pena ni gloria vio en la FP de autoedición que podía hacerlo mejor y empezó bachiller artístico sin saber muy bien qué estaba haciendo pero lo aprobó y con esa base metió el hocico en todo lo que tuviera que ver con perros; desde peluquería canina hasta psicopatología clínica canina. Podría sentar perros en un diván pero era más divertido seguir con cursos de auxiliar veterinaria y adiestramiento canino. Al fin y al cabo, ser psicólogo canino es ser psicólogo humano y ya hay demasiados humanos en esta vida.
Siempre ha luchado por vivir de lo que le gusta y tras hacer realidad hacer exposiciones de sus dibujos y trabajar con animales ya le tocaba publicar libros. Por eso tienes la oportunidad de leer su segunda novela, Perros en el tintero, que no es otra cosa que experiencia hilarante de la convivencia con estos simpáticos y desconcertantes animales.
¿Por qué?
Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:
«―¿Qué quieres de postre?          ―No hay nada.          ―Hay galletas. Y… turrón. Sigo sin saber por qué aún me queda turrón.          ―Quiero hablar contigo.          ―Era del blando pero ya estará duro y… ¿Qué?          ―Que tengo que hablar contigo ―soltó Joana sorprendiéndose a sí misma.          ―Una cosa antes… ¿Te has desecho de eso? Mañana vienen los dueños de Mario y no quiero meterme en berenjenales.         Joana estuvo a punto de gruñir entre dientes y recordando la cadena del baño rezongó:          ―Sí. Ya no está.          ―Guay. Dime entonces.          ―Para adoptarme necesitas tener una pareja…          Noemí asintió como si nada y apoyó la barbilla sobre sus nudillos que sujetaban verticalmente el tenedor:          ―Ah, sí. Algo de eso he leído en el contrato.          ―¿Y dónde está?          Noemí miró el reloj:          ―Seguramente esté trabajando pero no te preocupes por él. No vive aquí ―Joana dejó de entender la conversación―. ¿Algo más?          ―¿Cómo que no vive aquí?          Noemí le dio vuelta al tenedor y se rascó la cabeza con él:          ―Para explicar es un poco enrevesado… Lo simplificaré. Esa parte del contrato de adopción está ligeramente amañada.          ―¿Qué?          ―No te exasperes. Solo un poco ―dijo sonriendo―. Era necesario para adoptarte.          ―¿Y por qué me has adoptado?          ―¿Qué por qué qué?          ―Que por qué me adoptaste.          Noemí se encogió de hombros:          ―Porque tú querías venir conmigo.          ―Pero por qué un adolescente. Los niños son mejores. Todo el mundo quiere niños.          ―¿En serio? ¿Con la de trabajo que dan? ―dijo Noemí como pensando en voz alta. Sacudió la cabeza y volvió a encogerse de hombros―: ¿De verdad importa el porqué? Si crees que te voy a obligar a vivir la vida de cualquier forma que a mí me convenga ni te preocupes. La vida es algo personal. Deberías vivirla como tú prefieras».
¿Cómo?
Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.
Además...
Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona a la autora, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Tania Canento vea publicada su obra.

story:
Story of My Book

#PerFORM defines and explores core pillars that when combined translate into unstoppable performance and fulfillment for individuals, teams, and organizations. It unpacks, examines and addresses the fundamental problems we face in pursuit of our individual strengths and passion combined with something meaningful and motivational. 

...

My name is Peter Malek and I am the author of #PerFORM. I wrote this book because it became apparent to me over the years that I was personally struggling to find fulfillment in the places I worked over time. I was not alone, discovering a trend with friends, family members, colleagues, and strangers with similar stories and experiences. I wanted to find a way to share these relatable stories, experiences, and learnings with others. I wanted to help individuals evaluate and make life decisions getting in the way of what they are capable of and their overall happiness. 

Reading this book, you will discover the factors needed in any environment to unlock unstoppable performance and achieve personal fulfillment. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you assess your current environment and situation, rethink what matters most, and gain the confidence, reassurance, and motivation to unlock a level of performance hidden inside of you.

My hopes are that you walk away with memorable stories you can relate to, inspire you to share with others, and at least one learning that you can act on. Wherever and whatever that might be for you, what’s most important is that you never give up on your dreams and pursuit for what you are most passionate about. You have something special, and only you know what that is. Harness it, cherish it, and most importantly don’t be afraid to share it with the world.

In this book, you'll learn about what factors drive and unlock the highest levels of performance in individuals and teams and how these same factors result in personal fulfillment, which translate into something unstoppable: #PerFORM. You'll connect with stories from ordinary individuals that have reached extraordinary heights including...

  • Howard, a tech startup founder who wants to be able to create something meaningful for society.
  • Casey the educator, who wants to help others shape our future generation by bringing educators together to approach learning in a new, creative, fun, and innovative way that recognizes faculty and student strengths.
  • Shyam, a technology executive who's focus has been on transforming organizations by enabling the individuals with the right tools and technology combined with the learning that optimizes how and where they have a desire to deliver.
  • Sebastian, an LGBTQ small business owner that is helping his employees tap into each others' skills to improve each other, creatively approach problem solving, and create a safe and open environment that promotes human connection between employees and customers.
  • Chris, a leader at a major tech company and college rowing coach who has always wanted to design competitive teams by creating an environment that builds on the talents and abilities of a diverse group of individuals to teach them how to become stronger through trusting and serving each other.

You will love this book if you are looking to evaluate whether or not your current environment is setup for success for you and others long term, you are struggling to find fulfillment where you currently work or think you might be more fulfilled some where else, you are seeking a way to evaluate a major life and career related decision, you are looking to create or improve an environment that unlocks unstoppable levels of performance in individuals and teams while also achieving levels of fulfillment that creates an unbreakable bond.

#PerFORM is a nonfiction book that speaks to working professionals and leaders who want to look at how to achieve unstoppable performance and personal fulfillment in a new way.
 

The Book - #PerFORM

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + assessment chapters 1-2. Learn why we the operating models of our past and present are out dated and need to evolve. Evaluate your current #PerFORMance maturity based on a set of explicitly defined variables that are covered in more detail throughout each chapter of the book.

Part 2 contains chapters 3-9. Delve into 7 specific topical areas that makeup the defined variables for unlocking unstoppable performance and achieving personal fulfillment. Assess your current #PerFORMance maturity related to each variable at the end of each chapter based on what you have learned.

Part 3 contains the conclusion and post reading assessment, chapter 10. Learn about what best-in-class organizations demonstrate the highest level of #PerFORMance, and why. Recap the key take aways and next steps from the book including taking one last look at your #PerFORMance score from the start of the book to after you completed reading each chapter. Wrap-up and prepare to pivot or persevere harnessing what you learned and the decisions you were able to validate through your #PerFORM process journey.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  1. The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in [December, 2021.
  2. The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  3. The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  4. The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  5. The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  1. You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  2. Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  3. You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  4. You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  5. You will have the opportunity to schedule a 1:1 discussion and collaboration session 
  6. You will be able to schedule virtual or in-person speaking opportunities for meetings, workshops and events
  7. You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  8. And much more!

 

Campaign Goals

  • Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published
  • Tier 2: Hit $7,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

 

About the Author

Peter Malek is Head of Productivity for Consumer Informations Services in North America at Experian. Professionally, Peter is a versatile and proven Business and Technology executive with 20+ years of progressive achievement in organizational strategy, operational excellence, project/change management, product management, and business process optimization. 10+ years of leadership including building, implementing and scaling process excellence & automation practices, curriculum, training, offerings and service solutions.

Peter’s experience has revealed that the design of a team, including the role of a manager, cannot be determined based on performance alone. An organization has to closely examine individual levels of general happiness and emotional intelligence. As part of shifting from today’s mindset to tomorrow’s, organizations need to redesign how they operate.

When Peter started his book writing journey, he intended to focus on a new lens for process improvement to enable a high performing organization based on his extensive years of experience and depth of knowledge in process and operational excellence. It dawned on him that there was more to it than adoption and implementation of process improvement methods to create an environment that is truly high performing. That is what gave way to #PerFORM. Peter has always been a highly self motivated and top performing individual. At the same time, he will be the first to admit he has made many mistakes and had multiple failures as part of his journey. Peter is constantly seeking to improve and upgrade himself. This pursuit has ignited his passion in researching, reading, and taking courses, all in an ongoing attempt to unlock more meaning and fulfillment in his personal and professional career.

If you're a leader ready to build a company culture that unlocks the motivation of employees, who wants to give way to creative and innovative problem-solving, and create an environment that brings the hearts and minds of every employee to work each day as part of serving each other and the customer, this book is for you. If you're an employee looking to assess whether or not the environment you are in will unlock your greatest performance and personal fulfillment, this book is for you. After reading this book, you will be in a position to understand the maturity level of performance and fulfillment for yourself as a soon-to-be employee, existing employee or leader.

Whether you are self-employed, a startup beginning your journey, a young person fresh out of college looking for your first job, a battle-tested employee, a well-established company, or a senior executive, this book has stories, insights and lessons you can relate to, and thinking you can immediately put into practice to improve yourself, others, and your organization.

We often don’t realize what we need to be fulfilled until much later in life. If I’m able to impart the learnings from my experience as well as those I have gathered from experts in various fields to help save you time, stress, frustrations and avoid or minimize painful experiences in your life, I will consider this book a success.

For more information, you can connect with Peter Malek at petemalek@gmail.com and linkedin.com/in/peter-malek-8a980a1 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:

  • Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks
  • Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)
  • Use this Google Form to share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:

At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit ?)

Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.

When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

Please use #PerFORM and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

Tag:

LinkedIn - @PeterMalek / @NewDegreePress
Instagram - @Newdegreepress
Facebook - @PetrosMalek/@NewDegreePress
Twitter - @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Forever Grateful,
Peter Malek

story:
War of Words — Progressive Media Conference


The Norwich Radical are hosting their second ever progressive media conference in February 2018.

Our media is dominated by right wing voices, from Tory tabloids to Blairite broadsheets. Big business holds huge sway in broadcast, print and online journalism. It perpetuates the reactionary messages we hear and receive, making it complicit in the rise of a louder, powerful, regressive, conservative movement across the globe.

We're bringing people together from across the arts, academia, media, politics and activism to discuss, debate and enlighten on how we can build a better media and a more progressive society.

Unfortunately, to do this we need to pay for all sorts of things — from publicity to expenses and from equipment hire to signage. We're gathering some of our funding through merchandise sales and charging organisations for stalls, but we can't cover everything this way alone. So that's where you come in!

What your money could go towards:

£5 would allow us to print 250 fliers
£10 would allow us to print 50 posters
£30 would allow us to reimburse one speaker's transport expenses
£100 would allow us to fund a panel of speakers, including all transport expenses

In previous years we've had speakers and panels including Natalie Bennett, Michelle Stanistreet, Ben Chacko, Keri-Anne Mendoza, OpenDemocracy, Positive News, the English Collective of Prostitutes, Travellers Times, European Roma Rights Centre, and the New Internationalist. We'll be announcing this year's lineup and speakers in the near future!

To find out more, head to www.warofwordsconference.com or www.thenorwichradical.com. 


The Norwich Radical is a publication established for the purpose of providing progressive analysis of politics and the arts. We are a broad coalition of activists, writers, students and workers coming from an array of political backgrounds. The Norwich Radical is non-profit and run by volunteers.

story:
Once in love...

In this debut novel, Cathryn Kusner-Thompson invites readers into the flash and passion of the international world of dance. Readers meet Lillian Josephson, who has settled into a comfortable, predictable - and fabulously wealthy - existence with her long-time husband Charles. Lillian is not only a grande-dame of dance, but the center of a warm and talented circle of friends and family.

But Lillian's carefully maintained equilibrium is upset by a fateful meeting with her former lover, Tony, as she undertkes a challenging role as choreographer for her brother's new Broadway production. Will this chance meeting unravel Lillian - Lily, as Tony insists - and the cloak of security and stability she pulls tightly around her?  

Does Tony hold only the keys to the past, or is he the gatekeeper of a passionate future with the power to undue Lily's career, marriage, and all she's come to cherish?

What's in it for me?  

The money raised will allow me to get a professional design, editng, and promotion for tlhe novel.

What's in it for you?

  • Receive the book sooner
  • Receive a signed copy
  • Be acknowledged in the book
  • Be a part of th story.

This could be the beginning of a beautiful friendship!  

There are other ways you can help.  Not everyone is a "Charles George."

Know someone who likes love and romance - 31 flavors, not fifty shades - help spread the word.  Like Lily on Facebook or follow Cathryn on Twitter.

You can also use Indiegogo's "Share Tools" to help make my first novel a success.

Thank you!   Merci beaucoup!

story:
"Need a clinic or pharmacy that speaks your language? 
It's just a click away" - Toronto Star

"iamsick.ca is a brilliant solution to a problem many Canadians face every day: where to go when they're sick." - Mobile Syrup

 


(The Medical Post snapshot)







Our goal is to make the Canadian healthcare system more accessible to the public.


We've started with Ontario.. 
With your help, we can expand Canada-wide. 


Your vote will decide the province we'll add next!




Imagine hiking with your friends, and someone gets injured.  What do you do?

Have you ever tried calling a pharmacy or walk-in clinic, and only get their answering machine?  Wouldn't it be great to send them an email instead?

What about those long wait-times and queuing at walk-in clinics?

iamsick.ca is making access to healthcare easier for both the patient and the healthcare system.  Our healthcare wayfinding website & mobile apps show nearby emergency departments, urgent care centres, walk-in/after-hours clinics, and pharmacies for all of Ontario.

In September 2012, we launched the iamsick.ca website for University of Toronto students...but now it's time for us to expand the service Canada-wide!

Last year:
- we released free smartphone apps for BlackBerry 10, iPhone & Android
- our team was a finalist in the Ontario Centres of Excellence Student Social Entrepreneurship competition
- the iamsick.ca app was recognized as one of the best mobile health applications at the National Canadian e-Health conference

iamsick.ca has since been actively engaged in policy discussions to encourage governments to release healthcare provider data through Open Data initiatives, and iamsick.ca was even cited in Ontario's Open by Default report in March 2014.

Our ultimate goal is leverage technology to reduce barriers when accessing healthcare, but we need your help to take us to the next level!






We are looking to raise $9,000 to allow us to focus on expanding into a second Canadian province within a short timeframe (by July 9th).  And, we'll let you decide which province we'll expand into.  Your support and vote will show us that you want this service in your area.

Our ultimate goal is to grow our service Canada-wide.  If we raise $90,000, you will get full Canada-wide coverage in September.. from Cape Spear on the East coast..to Vancouver Island on the West coast.. and even up to Alert in the North.

Our free mobile apps will be perfect for your Canada-wide road trip, bike trip, hike or run.

If we do not reach our goal of $9,000, we will expand into the province with the most votes, but it will take us much longer.

So, please help us reach our goal, so all Canadians can benefit from our apps this summer!

 Fundraising Goal & Stretch Goals:


 PROJECT SCHEDULE


With your support, iamsick.ca will help reduce:

 AWARENESS BARRIERS





 LANGUAGE BARRIERS


 DATA BARRIERS






Courtney Szto - follow Courtney at http://courtneyszto.wordpress.com

Chris Borchert - follow Chris at http://www.chrisborchert.com



 THE iamsick.ca TEAM

iamsick.ca is social enterprise that consists of a multi-disciplinary team led by Ryan Doherty, a University of Toronto Medical Biophysics PhD candidate.  Our team consists of students and recent graduates from computer science, medicine, nursing, pharmacy, clinical engineering, health administration, public policy, business and law.




 WHAT PEOPLE SAY ABOUT iamsick.ca


 RECENT RECOGNITION

Finalist - 2013 Ontario Centres for Excellence Student Social Entrepreneurship competition

Winning app - 2013 Canadian e-Health conference - Battle of the Apps competition


 WHERE CAN I DOWNLOAD THE FREE IAMSICK.CA APPS?


 DOESN'T THE CANADIAN GOVERNMENT COVER THE COST OF HEALTHCARE? SHOULDN'T THE GOVERNMENT PAY FOR THIS SERVICE? 

We have met with government officials (including a Minister & Deputy Minister) and they love what we've created in Ontario, and we were even mentioned in Ontario's Open Government Engagement Team's Open Data Policy Recommendation report ("Open by Default"). iamsick.ca has also been presented by government officials as an example of a social enterprise that can leverage open data to improve the delivery of public services.  Receiving funding from the government isn't straight forward, and depends on regional priorities.  For now, funding this service isn't a priority.  However, we are and will continue to engage with government officials at the provincial, regional and municipal levels to encourage their involvement in Open Data initiatives and to explore funding opportunities. 

HOW WILL THE MONEY BE SPENT?

The funding goals were determined based on the cost of expanding into additional provinces, plus the added cost associated with increased usage (and taking into account the chance associated with having the crowd decide which province next [ie. PEI vs BC]).  This includes wages so we can focus full-time effort on expanding our coverage in the short timeframe, and the costs associated with gathering, validating & filling in gaps.



WHAT IF YOU DON'T REACH YOUR GOAL?

iamsick.ca has already helped tens of thousands of Ontarians, and we are committed to expanding our service regardless of how much money we raise. If we do not reach our goal, we will expand into the province with the most votes at a slower pace. Backers will still get a vote to decide "where next?", but it'll likely happen sometime this summer instead of by early July.
But that is the worst case scenario, and there are enough backers who are interested in helping Canadians access healthcare, right?



HOW WILL THE MONEY BE SPENT?

The funding goals were determined based on the cost of expanding into additional provinces, plus the added cost associated with increased usage (and taking into account the chance associated with having the crowd decide which province next [ie. PEI vs BC]).  This includes wages so we can focus full-time effort on expanding our coverage in the short timeframe, and the costs associated with gathering, validating & filling in gaps.



 CAN I ASK A QUESTION?

Sure!


Even if you can't contribute, you can help!

  • Please download our mobile apps & submit appstore reviews to let us know what you think.
  • Please visit our website & send us feedback to let us know how we can improve it: http://www.iamsick.ca
  • Please follow us on Twitter & Facebook to keep track of our progress.
  • Please share this campaign with friends, family & anyone you care about.

You can also donate digital currencies towards our campaign here:

 Auroracoin: AKReVdfsufEPXFTcru3GBuZeYLHcTwuAQm

 Bitcoin: 1BrYZDcGTpvAZQ2A9jSRKZidt7zbjJ7v3o

 Dogecoin: DMzVVvg4HTJPNwUR2s2yAXpMNhBcb6Ui2m

 Noirbit: E4aCx4RXA34D1mozvJf6UJmVJrmhR1WaQd

 Reddcoin: RpMrgzRDomWqBcHrfCR9C3XPKfoA32SSKF

 Ripple: rfMw8w7ZCaN2U5spZGA1z9agKQ558HYeDA


Feel free to contact us in the comments section or at indiegogo@iamsick.ca if you have any questions, concerns or feedback.


..don't forget that we're here to help the next time you think "I am sick".


We also support other crowdfunding campaigns - Kicking it forward

story:
The Project

“A book could be written on Tazy Phyllipz's involvement in both the Orange County music and ska scenes, but we don't have the space for that.”

Little did the OC Weekly know that, when they wrote that in February 2011, the Skafather was already ahead of them.  So here it is, the new book from Tazy Phyllipz. 

 The Rock N Roll, Ska Adventures of Tazy Phyllipz

From the beginnings of No Doubt to the breaking of Sublime and Maroon5, to the behind the scenes at being at the World Famous KROQ, to the life-changing decision of Travis Barker to the creation of Ska Parade, Tazy shares it all, and shares it all with you!

The book is a non-stop collection of historic, personal, hilarious, and serious stories.  Ska is back, and the Skafather is ready to tell you why!  Get an inside look at how he contributed and how he has been involved since his intro to the scene in 1989.

 

A Letter from Tazy

Hi Music Fans!

My name is Tazy Phyllipz and I am thrilled to bring this indiegogo campaign to you.  My new book is my way to give back to everyone who has supported me and my love of ska, as well as other forms of good music over the last twenty years!

I’m reaching out for your support as we march onward bringing my personal stories to the world.  I’m looking to release my eBook; and I need your help fundraising for the fixed market costs.  Costs include copy-editing, proofreading, cover design, layout and platform formatting, publishing, and more. 

There are a bunch of awesome perks available for those of you willing to help out, ranging from your name in the book to a Ska Parade Pizza Party with your friends and me. 

I have helped out a lot of famous acts just for the love for the music, not the money.

However, at this time, I am hoping you will support me in this indiegogo.com campaign for my new eBook.

Thanks in advance & Cheers! - T

 

About Tazy

Tazy Phyllipz has been hosting and producing specialty music and programming for over 20 years.  His renowned radio show Ska Parade has been credited as the launching pad for bands such as No Doubt, Maroon 5, Reel Big Fish, The Aquabats, Switchfoot, and Thrice, just to name a few.

Tazy has been an active promoter of the local OC music scene, as well as the international ska scene for many years, most recently booking artists at the Vans Warped Tour 2010, Viva Ska Vegas Festival 2012, The District, The Glass House, The Slidebar, and more!

Additionally, Tazy has been involved in the OC Music Awards since it’s beginnings and is always working to create new opportunities for local musicians.

Currently, Tazy is working and writing books; promoting and hosting concerts, and continuing production of the weekly Ska Parade radio show.

story:
Our Story

My name is Kay Gibbie. Welcome to my Indie Go-Go campaign for my children’s book, Are There French Fries in Heaven. I am on a mission to raise funds for a book that has been in the making for over six years – life happens. The big day is on July 13, National French Fries Day, and you can be instrumental in making it all happen. I only need $1,500 and you get some cool perks for assisting me in this endeavor. Then, you can tell your family and friends all about it on social media sites. Thank you in advance for your help.

 

About the Book

Six-year-old Kia loves French fries and she wants to know the answer to this delicious question, eventually discovering that grandma holds the key. The response makes Kia salivate and teaches her a lesson about overeating. Children’s Fiction (Picture Book), 32 pages, NCM Publishing Company, 2012.

 

The Impact

The book’s launch date centers around July 13, National French Fries Day. It will be held at French Fry Heaven in Jacksonville, Florida. If the campaign does not happen, it diminishes the promotional and marketing opportunities.  

What We Need & What You Get

I hope to raise $1,500. Funds will be used to assist with printing promotional materials and books, planning the book launch, and marketing the book. I have paid some of the costs already, but I do not have any other funding sources. You get some wonderful benefits for contributing to this campaign. Check out the sponsor levels on the right. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Show your support for Are There French Fries in Heaven? in other ways by...

 

  1. Promoting it on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media sites by using the share tools.
  2. Writing about it on your blog.
  3. Sending a personal email to your family and friends. 
  4. Telling at least three people the news.
  5. Sharing it with the media.
  6. Talking about it on the radio.

story:
Short Summary

 

EN

Help publishing NATURE DIARY – AFRICA!

Planeta Vivo (Living Planet) is seeking help to publish the Nature Diary – Africa. This Diary contains unique illustrations created by Luisa Nunes, Professor of Ecology and Artist. Luisa has spent her life sharing her unique insight about Nature and the World she sees around her. She shares this passion for nature with her paintings. Five years ago she started to compile the first Nature Diary, her idea was to motivate people for field observations and to inspire those interested in the natural world, starting with her own students. The Nature Diary has been published in Portuguese and has been very successful. But now the Publisher Living Planet, in collaboration with Luisa Nunes, is seeking a wider audience. Therefore, in this fifth edition, dedicated to the biodiversity of Africa, Luisa decided to make a full version in Portuguese and other in English.

The Portuguese version is already in press and is named Diário de Natureza 2013-África.  But additional funding is needed to complete the publication of the English version that can be used for three years. Your contribution will go towards the printing and distribution costs of the Diary and, as a perk, you may receive the English and/or Portuguese versions of the Diary autographed by the author, among other really cool perks.

You can follow it’s progress at: http://www.facebook.com/pages/PlanetaVivo/135386849841169

 

PT

Ajuda a editar o DIÁRIO DA NATUREZA - ÁFRICA!

Luisa Nunes é professora  mas a sua verdadeira paixão é a ilustração da natureza. Por isso, há cinco anos que se dedica à elaboração de o Diário da Natureza, para que todos possam usufruir dessa sua paixão. O Diário da Natureza é uma agenda anual ilustrada que tem sido editado em português, o que limita muito o acesso ao público não lusófono. Por isso, nesta quinta edição, dedicada à biodiversidade de África, a Luisa decidiu fazer uma versão inteira em português e outra em inglês. O Diário será editado pela PLANETA VIVO. A versão em português tem o nome de DIÁRIO DA NATUREZA 2013 - ÁFRICA e a versão inglesa NATURE DIARY - AFRICA. Precisamos da sua ajuda para editar estes belíssimos diários.

A sua contribuição tornará possível suportar uma parte da impressão e distribuição do Diário da Natureza. E ainda receberá em troca um belíssimo exemplar desta obra autografado pela autora, na versão portuguesa ou inglesa, conforme a sua preferência! 

Siga-nos em: http://www.facebook.com/pages/PlanetaVivo/135386849841169

 

What We Need & What You Get

EN

For the edition, the Living Planet needs $16,000 to cover printing costs. Eleven thousand have already been raised but the remaining $5000 are still needed so any help will be most appreciated and indeed will contribute in some small way to a better understanding and appreciating of the environment and nature that surround us. You may wish to choose a beautiful perk and this will be sent to you at the end of the campaign. Some of the perks are: A lovely postcard with one of the Nature diary illustrations, an autographed copy by the diary’s author, or, a copy of an engraving numbered illustration also signed by the author (limited edition).

PT

Para a edição, a Planeta Vivo necessita de 16.000 dólares para a impressão e tem 11.000 dólares para esse fim. Por isso, a sua ajuda é preciosa para obter o resto do valor necessário. Em contrapartida receberá (conforme o seu contributo): Exemplares autografados pela autora com o seu nome; Um cartão postal com uma ilustração do Diário; ou, se for muito generoso, uma cópia de uma gravura do Diário numerada e assinada pela autora, numa edição limitada.

 

The Impact

EN

This is an unique project. There are no other nature diaries that celebrate the natural splendor of life like this one. Luisa also has other future campaigns that depend on the success of the Diary project. You will be contributing to a larger programme where Luisa will reveal inspiring ways for others to experience and appreciate the natural wonders from different regions on this planet.

 

PT

Este é um projecto único. Não há no mundo um Diário assim, que celebre a natureza em todo o explendor. A Luisa tem muitos outros projectos que dependem do sucesso deste. Você contribuirá para que a Luisa possa dedicar-se a mostrar a todos as belezas naturais do mundo, com as suas ilustrações ímpares. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

EN

If you cannot contribute with money, you may disclose this project through your friends network. Explain to them how this project is unique contributing to the preservation of African wilderness and species. 

IndieGoGo has a number of tools available to promote this project, share it away!

 

PT

Se não puder contribuir com dinheiro, poderá divulgar este projecto pela sua rede de amigos. Diga-lhes o quão original este projecto é. Diga-lhes que o mundo precisa de o Diário da Natureza. E diga-lhes que estará a contribuir para a conservação da Natureza em África.

No Indiegogo tem uma série de ferramentas disponíveis para divulgar este projecto. Use-as!

Sponsor:

Editor:

UPTEC-PMAR

Avenida da Liberdade

4450-718 Leça da Palmeira, Portugal

E-mail: planetavivo@planetavivo.net

Facebook Planeta Vivo: http://www.facebook.com/pages/PlanetaVivo/135386849841169

Facebook Diário da Natureza: http://www.facebook.com/diario.denatureza?fref=ts

Web: www.planetavivo.net

Tel. +351220120762  Fax. +351220120761
story_txt:
Short Summary
 

EN
Help publishing NATURE DIARY – AFRICA!
Planeta Vivo (Living Planet) is seeking help to publish the Nature Diary – Africa. This Diary contains unique illustrations created by Luisa Nunes, Professor of Ecology and Artist. Luisa has spent her life sharing her unique insight about Nature and the World she sees around her. She shares this passion for nature with her paintings. Five years ago she started to compile the first Nature Diary, her idea was to motivate people for field observations and to inspire those interested in the natural world, starting with her own students. The Nature Diary has been published in Portuguese and has been very successful. But now the Publisher Living Planet, in collaboration with Luisa Nunes, is seeking a wider audience. Therefore, in this fifth edition, dedicated to the biodiversity of Africa, Luisa decided to make a full version in Portuguese and other in English.
The Portuguese version is already in press and is named Diário de Natureza 2013-África.  But additional funding is needed to complete the publication of the English version that can be used for three years. Your contribution will go towards the printing and distribution costs of the Diary and, as a perk, you may receive the English and/or Portuguese versions of the Diary autographed by the author, among other really cool perks.
You can follow it’s progress at: http://www.facebook.com/pages/PlanetaVivo/135386849841169
 
PT

story:
Introduction

Many philosophers, futurologists and artificial intelligence researchers have conjectured that in the next 20 to 200 years a machine capable of at least human level performance on all tasks will be developed. Since such a machine would among other things be capable of designing the next generation of even smarter intelligent machines, it is generally assumed that an intelligence explosion will take place shortly after such a technological self-improvement cycle begins. While specific predictions regarding the consequences of such an intelligence singularity are varied from potential economic hardship to the complete extinction of the humankind, many of the involved researchers agree that the issue is of utmost importance and needs to be seriously addressed. This book, “Artificial Superintelligence: A Futuristic Approach” will directly address this issue and consolidate research aimed at making sure that emerging superintelligence is beneficial to humanity.

Writing Sample: Leakproofing Singularity

What others said about: Leakproofing Singularity

“Yampolskiy’s excellent article gives a thorough analysis of issues pertaining to the “leakproof singularity”: confining an AI system, at least in the early stages, so that it cannot “escape”. It is especially interesting to see the antecedents of this issue in Lampson’s 1973 confinement problem in computer security. I do not have much to add to Yampolskiy’s analysis.”

David J. Chalmers, Professor of Philosophy, New York University

“This is great! I like the way you 

- introduce the state of the art in related security for ordinary computer systems 

- review the academic literature

- review the discussion-group posts which, though obscure, make innovative and essential points 

- enumerate possible failure scenarios, and suggest solutions 

- while pointing out clearly that all solutions can fail in the face of superintelligence.

This is exactly the sort of article the community needs.”

Joshua Fox, Research Associate at Singularity Institute  

“AI researcher Roman Yampolskiy’s article, ‘Leakproofing the Singularity: Artificial Intelligence Confinement Problem’, provides us with a detailed and well-reasoned analysis of … ways of externally constraining the AI design that might lead towards a singularity, especially constraining such AI to a virtual world from which it cannot leak into the real world.”

Uziel Awret, Editor of Special Issue on Singularity of Journal of Consciousness Studies

“The connection back to Lampson is very interesting and apt.”

Vernor Vinge, Hugo Award-winning author and Professor of Mathematics (retired)

Tentative List of Chapters:

1)     Introduction to Artificial Superintelligence.

2)     AI-Completeness – the Problem Domain of Superintelligent Machines.

3)     The Space of Mind Designs and the Human Mental Model.

4)     How to Prove that You Invented Superintelligence So No One Else Can Steal It.

5)     Wireheading, Addiction and Mental Illness in Machines.

6)     On the Limits of Recursively Self-Improving Artificially Intelligent Systems.

7)     Singularity Paradox and What to Do About It.

8)     Superintelligence Safety Engineering.

9)     Artificial Intelligence Confinement Problem (and Solution).

10)  Controlling Impact of Future Super AI.

Appendix

11)  Efficiency Theory: a Unifying Theory for Information, Computation and Intelligence.

12)  Unverifiability: Why Software Can’t Ever be Completely Bug Free.

13)  Artimetrics: Behavioral and Visual Identity Management of Artificial Agents.

14)  Wisdom of Artificial Crowds: Simulating Democracy and Intelligence of Crowds in Cyberspace.

 

Tentative Timeline:

January-May 2013: preparing fundraising campaign.

May – July 2013 (NOW): crowd funding campaign and continuing research.

July – October 2013: writing of the book.

October-December 2013: re-writing, editing, revising, proofreading, formatting, finalizing cover design, publishing.

Early 2014: shipping!!!

About the Author

Dr. Roman Yampolskiy conducts research in Artificial Intelligence Safety and Technological Singularity. An alumnus of Singularity University (GSP2012) and a visiting fellow / research advisor of the Singularity Institute (MIRI), Dr. Yampolskiy has contributed papers to the first book on Singularity (Singularity Hypotheses, Springer 2012), first journal issue devoted to Singularity (Journal of Consciousness Studies, 2012) and the first conference devoted to safe Super-Intelligent systems (AGI Safety, 2012).

Roman V. Yampolskiy holds a PhD degree from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the University at Buffalo. There, he was a recipient of a four year NSF (National Science Foundation) IGERT (Integrative Graduate Education and Research Traineeship) fellowship. Before beginning his doctoral studies, Dr. Yampolskiy received a BS/MS (High Honors) combined degree in Computer Science from Rochester Institute of Technology, NY, USA.

After completing his PhD dissertation, Dr. Yampolskiy held a position of an Affiliate Academic at the Center for Advanced Spatial Analysis, University of London, College of London. In 2008 Dr. Yampolskiy accepted an assistant professor position at the Speed School of Engineering, University of Louisville, KY. He had previously conducted research at the Laboratory for Applied Computing (currently known as Center for Advancing the Study of Infrastructure) at the Rochester Institute of Technology and at the Center for Unified Biometrics and Sensors at the University at Buffalo.

Dr. Yampolskiy is an author of over 100 publications including multiple journal articles and books. His research has been cited by numerous scientists and profiled in popular magazines both American and foreign (New Scientist, Poker Magazine, Science World Magazine), dozens of websites (BBC, MSNBC, Yahoo! News) and on radio (German National Radio, Alex Jones Show). Reports about his work have attracted international attention and have been translated into many languages including Czech, Danish, Dutch, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Romanian, and Spanish.

FAQ

How the money will be spent?

The money is mostly needed to pay for the publication, marketing and distribution costs as well as the costs of editing, and proofreading the book. Some funds will also go to acquire copyrighted materials such as images for the cover and for ongoing research expenses. Additionally, Dr. Yampolskiy works under a contract with the University of Louisville which doesn’t include June and July. A portion of the raised funds will be used to feed Dr. Yampolskiy during that time as he will be very hungry from all that writing.  

What has already been done?

Most of the research has been completed. You can never be done consulting with the experts, but I have already had a chance to exchange ideas with the world’s best scientists and philosophers. Some drafts have been written for individual chapters. Professionals have been recruited for cover design and proofreading.

Who designed this awesome book cover?

A friend and a former classmate Svetlana Dolinskiy is responsible for the design of the front cover.

I found a spelling error what should I do?

Call 911! No wait, just email me, I will fix it and thank you.

Have you published any other books?

Yes, this would be my 7th book. You can find my other books for sale on Amazon.com.

Do you have links to the media coverage about your research?

Yes, you can find them linked from my homepage. Even before this funding campaign got started I was fortune to have a lot of interest in my research from popular media.

I am with the media and I would like to interview you about your research, what is the best way to get in touch with you?

My email and phone numbers are listed on my homepage. roman.yampolskiy@louisville.edu

Do you have any other videos of you presenting your research?

Yes, I have a few available online: my talk at AGI conference in Oxford, and my Ignite presentation at Singularity University.

Disclaimer

This project is undertaken as a personal initiative and I am not acting as a representative of any organization, group, institution, company or future superintelligence. I am (Roman Yampolskiy) solely responsible for this fundraising campaign including proposed work, expressed ideas or opinions and promised deliverables. Neither University of Louisville nor any other organization or person should be held liable or assumed to share said opinions, ideas or goals or any legal or financial responsibility to the campaign supporters.

story:
Please help me meet my $3,628 illustration goal for the successful publication of my children’s book!

 

Who am I and what is this children’s book about?

My name is Annesa L Lacey of Chicago, IL and I am a budding social media/event marketer and ghost-writer.  Being a mother and social media and event marketer is my life.  I’m so proud of my teenage daughter and the excellent woman she is becoming.  She’s a great-natured kid who looks out for her fellow mankind and is always laughing, if not always encouraging others.

Pretty hard to believe, considering the rocky start she got in life.  Her parents have been divorced since October 2002, and this precious child had encountered strife while still in the womb.

By grace, my daughter has long overcome the combative atmosphere she was momentarily accustomed to living in, along with the respiratory issues she was born with.  One day when my daughter was just four years old, she decided to assert “authority” over her parents, demanding that my ex-husband and I be quiet. She had her fill of our bickering in front of her.

This book is to serve as a help to parents – for them to remember no child’s first lesson in warfare should begin in the home.  That’s it.  Nothing else.  This book will be told from a child’s vantage-point, because that should be the most valued point of view there is.

Because every little bit helps, the sooner this book is completed, the sooner parents around the world can have an extra reminder of just who matters most in their households: their children.

What I’ve Already Done

I have already paid for the following:

Book publishing package
PR Publicist 
Standard Interior Format
Private label imprint and optional ISBN 
Print-ready cover
Paperback Format

 

What I Need and What You’ll Get Out of It

The costs are as follows:

-      $237 Fundraising campaign fees

-      $999 for every 10 illustrations;

-      $199 for every single illustration

I have 27 illustrations in my book – including the cover.

Without funding, this project is going to take much longer to complete as I self-fund all of my works. The longer it takes to publish, the longer kids around the world have to wait to get a voice in book-form.

What are the perks?   They’ll range from my heart-felt thanks to a free copy of the book upon publication, and even better: a mention in the “Special Thanks” section of the book.  Or how about a feature of your organization or brand in online media?

 

Why Should You Care?

Let’s face it: we’re inundated frequently with news of how our children are lost or otherwise out of control.  Why?  Have they ever been given a voice?  Have they ever been told they (or their points of view) matter?

Have they ever been told how great they are?   Let’s turn off our tech devices, turn off our TV’s and find out what our kids are up to!  Let’s disconnect ourselves from what we’ve given so much attention to unnecessarily, and tune into those people in our houses who are literally on stand-by, just waiting for us to show a sliver of interest in their lives, who their friends are, and just overall care of how they are doing!

Listen, you won’t catch my kid on Dr. Phil for any intervention!  I just look into my kids eyes (and track her Instagram, Twitter, tumblr and Facebook accounts!) and talk to her.  I let her know her opinion counts. 

Parents, let our littlest or tallest ones know that we value their input!

Lastly, I am very passionate about helping other parents as well as children.  For the love of everything good, PLEASE allow me and my ex-husband to serve as a cautionary tale as how NOT to handle conflict in front of children when they are smallest and most impressionable.

Remember, you can specify how much you give! The levels are just suggestions, but if you want to contribute an 'in between' amount, please do so!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

It’s Ok if you don't have $20 to contribute. Please help spread the word of this IndieGoGo campaign through each of your social media channels.  Without your help, this campaign won't be successful.

Thanks so much for your anticipated time, attention and monetary contributions!

The costs are as follows:
-      $237 Fundraising campaign fees
-      $999 for every 10 illustrations;
-      $199 for every single illustration
I have 27 illustrations in my book – including the cover.
Without funding, this project is going to take much longer to complete as I self-fund all of my works. The longer it takes to publish, the longer kids around the world have to wait to get a voice in book-form.
What are the perks?   They’ll range from my heart-felt thanks to a free copy of the book upon publication, and even better: a mention in the “Special Thanks” section of the book.  Or how about a feature of your organization or brand in online media?
 
Why Should You Care?
Let’s face it: we’re inundated frequently with news of how our children are lost or otherwise out of control.  Why?  Have they ever been given a voice?  Have they ever been told they (or their points of view) matter?
Have they ever been told how great they are?   Let’s turn off our tech devices, turn off our TV’s and find out what our kids are up to!  Let’s disconnect ourselves from what we’ve given so much attention to unnecessarily, and tune into those people in our houses who are literally on stand-by, just waiting for us to show a sliver of interest in their lives, who their friends are, and just overall care of how they are doing!
Listen, you won’t catch my kid on Dr. Phil for any intervention!  I just look into my kids eyes (and track her Instagram, Twitter, tumblr and Facebook accounts!) and talk to her.  I let her know her opinion counts. 
Parents, let our littlest or tallest ones know that we value their input!
Lastly, I am very passionate about helping other parents as well as children.  For the love of everything good, PLEASE allow me and my ex-husband to serve as a cautionary tale as how NOT to handle conflict in front of children when they are smallest and most impressionable.
Remember, you can specify how much you give! The levels are just suggestions, but if you want to contribute an 'in between' amount, please do so!
 
Other Ways You Can Help
It’s Ok if you don't have $20 to contribute. Please help spread the word of this IndieGoGo campaign through each of your social media channels.  Without your help, this campaign won't be successful.
Thanks so much for your anticipated time, attention and monetary contributions!

story:
Présentation de la revue Les 3 sex*

Alors que la tendance des magazines indépendants, au contenu recherché et à l’esthétisme léché, a pris d'assaut l’Angleterre et l’Australie, le Québec amorce tranquillement son entrée dans la mouvance. Habituellement réservé à l’art de vivre, à la culture ou à la cuisine, les revues professionnelles y sont rares. Les 3 sex*, dont le titre dérive des termes sexe, sexualité, sexologie, se présente comme une revue indépendante spécialisée dans les domaines de la sexologie et connexe.

 

La revue Les 3 sex* se trouve à mi-chemin entre le journal académique et la revue culturelle. Ne publiant pas d’articles scientifiques, elle offre plutôt à son lectorat une diversité de contenu rigoureux ayant pour thème commun la sexualité. La recension d’actualité sexologique et de production scientifique permet au lectorat d’être à jour sur l’évolution de la discipline. Alors que les chroniques et les témoignages stimulent les questionnements sur une variété de thématiques.

 

Adressé principalement à un public d’universitaires et de professionnels, la revue Les 3 sex* ne vise pas la vulgarisation de contenu mais plutôt le partage et l’échange sur des enjeux sexologiques. D’autre part, malgré son public cible, la revue sexologique n’est pas réservé à ce dernier et s’avère enrichissante pour la population intéressée à la discipline sexologique.

 

Pourquoi une levée de fonds?

 

Afin d'inaugurer officiellement le site internet (les3sex.com) de la revue sexologique Les 3 sex*, un lancement se déroulement le 20 septembre au Lobby Bar, à Montréal. Puisque nous désirons offrir une entrée gratuite et assurer les frais de location de matériel et de personnel, même si nous faisons salle comble, nous perderons de l'argent. De plus, l'argent amassé pourra assurer en partie les coûts associés à la création et la gestion du site internet, nécéssaire au lancement. 

 

À noter que les cinquantes premières personnes qui feront des dons de 20$ ou plus seront récompensé d'un billet pour le lancement. Simplement nous envoyé un message à les3sex@gmail.com afin de récolter votre récompense.

 

Autres façons d'aider

 

Pour les personnes qui désirent aider mais n'ont pas les moyens financiers, il existe d'autre moyen de participer à ce projet:

  • Aimer et Partager la page de Les 3 sex* facebook https://www.facebook.com/les3sex/?fref=ts 

  • Envoyer une chronique ou un témoignage à faire publier dans la revue (Pour plus d'Information, nous contacter à les3sex@gmail.com)
  • Offrir bénévolement votre temps et vos compétences lors de projets ou d'évènements

story:
We are over 200% FUNDED 

THANK YOU!
I have often said I have the best readers in the world. This just goes to show that is not an exaggeration. The book has been sent to the professional editor, now that I can be sure of being able to pay her.
Christmas is Coming!

There is no way that the physical books will be ready before Christmas, but if you'd like to give one as a present, I can easily provide you with a "you're getting Guy's new book when it comes out" certificate; just order the copies that you want, and send me an email (to guywindsor@gmail.com)  to let me know that you need the certificate; I'll email you back a pdf by December 18th, which you can print out or email to the lucky recipient. I'll also ship it directly to them if you want.

Many backers have asked for the first book in this series, The Medieval Dagger, to be made available to buy here. I have ordered a case of them, and they are on their way! I have added them as a separate perk here. For logistical reasons, it's much easier to keep them separate from The Medieval Longsword and Advanced Longsword, so I won't combine them in a single perk package. Numbers are limited, so order yours now!
I have also got the first draft of the cover for the new book back from my layout professional (now that I can be sure of being able to pay her too). What do you think?


We have also reached our first stretch goal: free Audatia Print and Play decks for all backers; what should our next goal be? Please leave suggestions in the comments here.
Now, about the book:

Are you ready for the next level?

My third book on training authentic Italian medieval longsword combat is ready to go to layout. The book is written, the photos taken and processed, but I need to hire a professional editor to spot the typos, and a professional layout artist to create the print files and ebook files. This is where you come in! By buying the book in advance, you not only get it first, you also help make it possible. 

This book builds on my previous longsword book, The Medieval Longsword, so I am including a free ebook copy of The Medieval Longsword with every perk, just in case you don't have it already.

All backers will be credited in the book, unless you choose to remain anonymous. 

About Me:

I am a professional swordsmanship instructor, founder and head of The School of European Swordsmanship. I have been working on my interpretation of Fiore dei Liberi's Art of Arms since the mid-90s, and full time for a living since 2001. In 2004 I produced The Swordsman's Companion, which got a generation of longsword enthusiasts started on the path. I have refined and developed my interpretation, improved my training methods, and written it all down in a series of books starting with Mastering the Art of Arms volume 1: The Medieval Dagger, and continuing with Mastering the Art of Arms volume 2: The Medieval Longsword.


 This new book, complete with over 200 beautiful photos, is volume three, provisionally titled Advanced Longsword: Form and Function. I need your help to raise funds for copyediting, layout, printing, and shipping.

About the Book:

This is the third volume in the series, and it covers more advanced techniques, like the Punta Falsa, and more detailed discussion of the source: Il Fior di Battaglia. The book includes detailed instructions for three longsword forms, known as "The Cutting Drill", the "Farfalla di Ferro", and "The Syllabus Form". Each step of the Syllabus Form is expanded on at some length, and includes a wide range of material from Il Fior di Battaglia. 
The Cutting Drill is a basic sequence of six blows, followed by four more sophisticated techniques. By itself, it contains every common strike in the system at least once, and an example of every core principle in action. The Farfalla di Ferro is a striking drill that emphasises continuous flowing motion; it's beautiful, and deadly! The Syllabus Form, as the name implies, contains a reference to just about every aspect of Fiore's Art of Arms. It took about 12 years to develop it to its current peak of usefulness.
The material in the book is supported by a wide range of video clips and free articles.
The table of contents should give you a good idea of how much material I cover.
  • Introduction: about how to create and train with forms
  • The Cutting Drill
  • The Farfalla di Ferro
  • The Syllabus Form: divided into 17 subchapters, one for each step
  • Training with Sharp Swords
  • Using the Form
  • Bibliography, Acknowledgements.

You can read a sample chapter here, though please note we have updated the images. You can see from the layout that I did on it, that I really need to hire a professional!

The Photos:

As with my last two books, the photos were taken by the excellent Jari Juslin (with assistance from Petteri Kihlberg). You can get an idea of the quality here:

Which is already reduced from a 20MB tiff file to a 3.5MB jpg. The tiffs support this level of magnification:

And as with The Medieval Longsword, I will release all the images as jpgs for free once the book is published, so you can zoom in to your heart's content.

What about Volume One, The Medieval Dagger?

Volume one in this series was published by Freelance Academy Press, who did a beautiful job on the editing and layout, but as a very US based company, their distribution outside the USA is very expensive, and they are not really set up for bulk orders. I have ordered a big box of the book from them (which has worked twice before). Once I am sure of the supply, I will add the possibility to get all three volumes from this one campaign. The instant I get confirmation that the order is going through, I'll add it as a limited perk, and send out a campaign update to all backers.

Our first stretch goal will be:

When we pass 5,000 Euros, I will add the print and play PDF files for the first two Audatia Duel Decks: Galeazzo and Boucicault to EVERY PERK. Buy the book, get the game.


We developed this game to help students internalise the logic and terminology of Fiore's Art of Arms; playing it really boosts your grasp of the system. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word about this campaign to anyone and everyone who you think might be interested. I really appreciate your help, and I couldn't do this without you. So much so that I am running a referrals competition. There are two categories: eyeballs and sales.

Eyeballs

Whoever sends the most people to see the campaign will get two free copies of the book in hardback, sent wherever you want.

Sales

The person whose referrals generate the highest sales will also get two hardbacks, and can commission an instalment of The Swordsman’s Quick Guide, on any topic you like. I will write the booklet for you and publish it (at my discretion; if your request is vastly off-topic I might choose to simply send you the finished booklet for you to do with what you like).

If the same person wins both categories, I’ll add a runner-up prize; whoever comes second in the sales category gets a free hardback, signed and sent wherever you like.

How do you take part? 

You need to log in to Indiegogo, which generates your own specific url for the campaign, which will look like http://igg.me/at/longsword2/x/00000 where the last set of numbers is your unique identifier. Then share this link as best you can, and Indiegogo will track the link for you.

Thanks again,

Guy.
